Text_en: Uh... one time I was with my mom and dad in the village, after I was grown (I was like eight), and my grandmother came to visit us.
Text_ortho: Ehm di time wey I dey with my moder, my fader for village, after I con grow (I con dey like eight years), my grand moder con come visit us.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Uh... the time I was with my mother, my father in the village, after I got older (I was about eight years old), my grandmother came and visited us.

Text_en: She wanted to take me to go and train me.
Text_ortho: Sey e wan carry me go meh e go train me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He wanted to take me to train me.

Text_en: Because at my dad's, we could only go to the farm.
Text_ortho: Because for my fader village sef, na only farm, farm, farm we dey go.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because in my father's village, we were going to a farm and a farm.

Text_en: At the time, I was small and could farm really well.
Text_ortho: Dat time sef, I dey small, and I sabi do farm well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: In fact, I was very young and I know how to work in the fields.

Text_en: My grandmother said this farm, this farm work was no good for me.
Text_ortho: My grand moder say dis farm, say dis farm no go good for me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My grandmother said this farm... said this farm would not be good for me.

Text_en: That I should go to school first.
Text_ortho: Meh me a go for school first.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said I should go to school first.

Text_en: So I went to my grandf-... grandmother's.
Text_ortho: Con go my grand f-... moder place.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He went to my grand f-... mother's place.

Text_en: I was schooled there for four years.
Text_ortho: I dey dere o, I school o, setay four years.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm there, I'm educated, I've been staying for four years.

Text_en: After those four years, my mom said the work had become too much for her to do alone.
Text_ortho: After dat four years now, my moder con say di work alone don dey too much for am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: After four years, my mother said the work was too much for her to do.

Text_en: That I should come help her for a while.
Text_ortho: Make me I con help am for some times first.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I should come and help him a few times.

Text_en: I was there, helping her.
Text_ortho: I con dey dere, con dey help am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was there, I was helping him.

Text_en: I kept farming.
Text_ortho: Dey farm, dey farm.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm in the field, I'm in the farm.

Text_en: I farmed for almost five years.
Text_ortho: I farm almost five years.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I worked for almost five years.

Text_en: I didn't go back to school.
Text_ortho: I no go back to school again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I won't go back to school again.

Text_en: I stayed there
Text_ortho: I con dey o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was just there.

Text_en: Ha! Even for money to buy things, you won't see any money.
Text_ortho: Ah to see money to buy tins self, you no go see money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ah, to find money to buy things, you won't have money.

Text_en: For any little thing you do, though, you will make money quick.
Text_ortho: But any small tin weh you do, you go quick get money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But if you do a little, you will quickly get money.

Text_en: Finding something to do, that was the hard part.
Text_ortho: But to see am do, na im con dey hard.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But to see him do, that's hard.

Text_en: Until there were a lot of us.
Text_ortho: Sotay we come plenty o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So we were a lot of people.

Text_en: So my friend and I, we started to work together for people.
Text_ortho: Me, and my friend, we con dey do work for people together.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then myself, and my friend, we started working together.

Text_en: Then, at the end of the year, they would come give us our money.
Text_ortho: Den, ending of di year, de go con dey pay us our money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then, at the end of the year, they will pay us our money.

Text_en: We would use it to buy clothes, anything we wanted.
Text_ortho: We go use am, go buy cloth, wetin we wan.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We will use it to buy clothes, what we want.

Text_en: We used it to take care of ourselves.
Text_ortho: Dey use am, dey take care of ourself.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Useing it to take care of ourselves.

Text_en: Then we did "waye" work again, we got the money and shared it
Text_ortho: We con do waye work again, we con get di money, we con share our money together.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We worked hard again, we got the money, we shared our money together.

Text_en: All of us said we wanted to go to school.
Text_ortho: All of us say we wan go school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All of us said we wanted to go to school.

Text_en: We wanted to go back to school.
Text_ortho: We wan go back to school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We want to go back to school.

Text_en: So, then I went to school until two thousand and eight.
Text_ortho: So I con go school o, con reach two thousand and eight.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So I went to school and got to two thousand and eight.

Text_en: Then I finished primary school there.
Text_ortho: I con finish primary school dere.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I finished primary school there.

Text_en: I told my father, well, I want to go to the city to go see how the school is.
Text_ortho: I tell my fader sey toh me I wan go city mah go see how di school be.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I told my father that well, I want to go to the city so I can go and see how the school is.

Text_en: That I was tired of school in the village.
Text_ortho: Sey me I don tire for village school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm tired of teaching in the village school.

Text_en: My father said okay, he will get money to register me anywhere I want to go to start secondary school.
Text_ortho: My fader say okay im go find money wey im go go register me anywhere weh me I wan go start secondary school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My father said okay, he will look for money to register me in the place where I want to start my secondary schooling.

Text_en: I said okay.
Text_ortho: I say okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said okay.

Text_en: That's what we did.
Text_ortho: Na so we con do o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That was how we did it.

Text_en: My father said it wouldn't be until after December, around January, that he would get me registered.
Text_ortho: My fader say after December, January time, before im go go register me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My father said, "my father, after December, January, before he will register me."

Text_en: So, right then, that my uncle came from Abuja.
Text_ortho: So dat moment, na im my uncle con come from Abuja.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So at that moment, my uncle came from Abuja.

Text_en: He came to construct a building for one of our uncles.
Text_ortho: Con do one building for one of our uncle like dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then he built something for one of our uncles.

Text_en: He then came.
Text_ortho: E con come.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He came.

Text_en: When he was leaving he said I should be ready for him to take me to Abuja.
Text_ortho: E say if im dey go, sey meh me I dey ready, sey im go carry me go Abuja.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said if he's going, he should make sure that I'm ready, he will carry me to Abuja.

Text_en: I said "alright."
Text_ortho: I con say okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I said okay.

Text_en: "Do you want to take me to Abuja?"
Text_ortho: Eh you wan carry me go Abuja?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Eh, you want to take me to Abuja?

Text_en: He said "yes."
Text_ortho: E say eh.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said eh.

Text_en: I said "okay, but uncle, I want to go to school."
Text_ortho: I say toh but uncle, I wan go school o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said well, but uncle, I want to go to school.

Text_en: He told me not to worry.
Text_ortho: E say meh me I no worry.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said I shouldn't worry.

Text_en: If he takes me, I'll go to school.
Text_ortho: Sey if e carry me go dere, me I go go school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If he takes me there, I will go to school.

Text_en: So I said okay.
Text_ortho: Naim I say okay now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I said, okay.

Text_en: The time came when we wanted to leave.
Text_ortho: Con dey o reach di day weh wan go.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The day he wanted to go.

Text_en: So the two of us got on the bus for Abuja.
Text_ortho: Two of us con enter motor come Abuja.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The two of us got into a car and came to Abuja.

Text_en: When I got to Abuja, I stayed there.
Text_ortho: As con come Abuja, I con dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When I came to Abuja, I was there.

Text_en: At that time, I couldn't... I couldn't speak English fluently but I was getting by.
Text_ortho: Dat time self, I no, I no sabi speak English like dat but I dey manage.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: At the time, I didn't... I didn't know English, but I was managing.

Text_en: So, then my uncle came.
Text_ortho: So my uncle con come.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So my uncle came.

Text_en: I was there for like a month.
Text_ortho: I con dey like one month.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was like a month later.

Text_en: Now I could speak.
Text_ortho: I con sabi dey speak.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I knew how to speak.

Text_en: Then my uncle said we should go to school.
Text_ortho: Naim my uncle say meh we go school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then my uncle said we should go to school.

Text_en: I then went to school to register.
Text_ortho: I con go school go register for school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I went to school to register for school.

Text_en: It was from there that I started school.
Text_ortho: Na dere I con start school o, con start school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's where I started school, I started school.

Text_en: I went to school and then came back home to stay.
Text_ortho: I dey go school, and I dey come back dey stay house.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm going to school, and I'm coming back to stay in the house.

Text_en: I told my uncle I could not stay at home any longer.
Text_ortho: I tell my uncle sey uncle, me I no fit stay for house again o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I told my uncle, Uncle, I can't stay in the house again.

Text_en: If I come back, if I am back from school, I should find a job to learn.
Text_ortho: If I dey come back, if I don come back for school, mah go dey find work weh I wan learn.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If I'm coming back, if I've come back from school, I should go and look for a job I want to learn.

Text_en: My uncle asked what my problem was and why I wanted to learn a trade.
Text_ortho: My uncle say wetin be my problem meh me I wan learn work?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My uncle said, "what's my problem that made me want to learn a trade?"

Text_en: I said uncle, the problem is, nobody knows what the future will bring.
Text_ortho: I say uncle, di problem be sey now, nobody know how tomorrow go be.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said, "my uncle, the problem is that now, nobody knows how tomorrow will be."

Text_en: Maybe I can finish the junior WAEC.
Text_ortho: Maybe I fit con finish junior WAEC now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Maybe I can finish the junior WAEC then.

Text_en: I don't have any money to go back to school.
Text_ortho: I no see money to go back to school again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don’t have money to go back to school again.

Text_en: Or look at how, uh... money is now, it doesn’t flow like before any more.
Text_ortho: Or e see as eh money now, no dey come like dat before again?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Or he sees as uh... money is not coming like that again?

Text_en: So my uncle said "okay."
Text_ortho: My uncle con say okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My uncle said okay.

Text_en: What did I want to learn?
Text_ortho: Sey wetin me I wan go learn now?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: "What do I want to learn now?"

Text_en: I told him I wanted to learn to cut hair.
Text_ortho: I tell am sey I wan go learn barbing salon.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I told him I wanted to go and learn a barber's salon.

Text_en: He said okay, I should go for it.
Text_ortho: E say okay mah go now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said okay, let me go now.

Text_en: Then I went to meet a guy I knew.
Text_ortho: I con go meet one man wah I know.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I went to meet a man, I know.

Text_en: I told him I wanted to learn a job from him.
Text_ortho: I con tell am sey I wan learn work for im hand.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I told him I wanted to learn a trade in his hands.

Text_en: He said okay, I should go call my uncle.
Text_ortho: Di man say okay meh me I go call my uncle come.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The man said okay, let me go and call my uncle.

Text_en: I told him okay, before I go call my uncle, he'll tell me what to bring
Text_ortho: Naim I tell am sey okay before I go go call my uncle come, e go give me wetin, and wetin we go bring.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I told him, okay, before I go and call my uncle, he will give me what... and what we will bring.

Text_en: Before I go tell my uncle, let me know what he meeds to bring.
Text_ortho: Before I go go tell my uncle, meh know wetin e go bring.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Before I go to tell my uncle what he will bring.

Text_en: He said okay.
Text_ortho: E say okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said okay.

Text_en: We'll get crates of soft drinks, and some cookies, and money.
Text_ortho: Sey we go buy crate of mineral, and some biscuit, with money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said we will buy crate of minerals, and some biscuits with money.

Text_en: Since he knows me, we'll bring eight thousand naira.
Text_ortho: Sey as e know me, meh we bring eight thousand.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said as she knows me, let's bring eight thousand.

Text_en: I said okay.
Text_ortho: I say okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said okay.

Text_en: I went to meet my uncle.
Text_ortho: I go meet my uncle.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I went to meet my uncle.

Text_en: So my uncle said okay, tomorrow morning, before he goes to work, I'll take him there.
Text_ortho: Naim my uncle con say okay tomorrow morning, before im go work, meh me I carry am go dere.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then my uncle said, "OK, tomorrow morning, before he goes to work, I should take him there."

Text_en: So we went there and met the guy
Text_ortho: We con go dere, we con meet di man.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We went there, we met the man.

Text_en: He told the guy that he would bring al-, everything he had listed.
Text_ortho: E con tell di man di day weh e go bring al-... everytin weh di man talk.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He told the man the day he would bring al-... everything the man had said.

Text_en: The man said okay, I can start learning today.
Text_ortho: Di man say okay meh me I start to dey learn work today.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The man said okay, let me start learning the trade today.

Text_en: I then stayed there learning the trade.
Text_ortho: I con dey dey learn work o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was learning a trade.

Text_en: Then my uncle brought everything.
Text_ortho: Naim my uncle con bring everytin come.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then my uncle brought everything up.

Text_en: The man said I'd stay with him for five years to learn the job.
Text_ortho: Di man say na five years me I go dey im hand meh me I learn di work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The guy said I'd be with him for five years to learn the work.

Text_en: I then told him "well, but what if I master the skills before the five years, I can go open my own shop, right?"
Text_ortho: I con tell am sey toh but if I sabi before dat five years nko, I fit go open my own shop right?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I told him, "well, but if I know, for five years, I can go open my own shop, right?"

Text_en: He said yes but I will graduate first before I go open my own shop.
Text_ortho: E say eh but I go do freedom first before I go open my own shop.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said uh... but I'll get free first before opening my own shop.

Text_en: I said "okay, if that's it, no problem."
Text_ortho: I say okay if na dat one, no problem!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said, "OK, if it's that, no problem!"

Text_en: So I continued working on and on and on.
Text_ortho: Con dey work, dey work, dey work, dey work o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He was working, he was working, working, he was working.

Text_en: Until the time came that I wanted to write the junior WAEC.
Text_ortho: Con reach when I wan write junior WAEC.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I wanted to write the junior WAEC.

Text_en: I already mastered the job and was making money.
Text_ortho: I con sabi di work now, and money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I learned the job, and money.

Text_en: I then realized that in this country of ours, things were starting to become difficult.
Text_ortho: I con see sey dis our country, tins go con dey hard now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I then realized that things would get harder in this country.

Text_en: I then told my boss "Well, there is this job I found."
Text_ortho: I con tell my oga sey toh e get one work weh me I see o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I told my boss, "well, there's a job I've seen."

Text_en: "Let me go do it and they will pay me."
Text_ortho: Mah go do, and dem go pay me money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Mah will do it, and they will pay me.

Text_en: "So if they pay me, I will get the money for my graduation."
Text_ortho: So dat if de pay me di money, mah see money wah go con do freedom.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if they pay me the money to get me the money so I can go and get free.

Text_en: My boss said "okay", I should go.
Text_ortho: My oga say okay, meh me I go now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My boss said okay, let me go now.

Text_en: As long as place I was going was good, I should be careful there.
Text_ortho: Sey as far as di place weh me I dey go good, meh me I dey careful for dere.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said that as far as I'm going to the place where I'm going, I should be careful.

Text_en: I said "okay."
Text_ortho: I say okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said okay.

Text_en: I was there.
Text_ortho: I con dey o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was just there.

Text_en: I went to work.
Text_ortho: Con go dey work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then he went to work.

Text_en: After I worked and the woman paid me, I started completing the junior WAEC.
Text_ortho: After I work wey di woman dey pay me my money, I come from dere finish my junior WAEC.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: After I got paid by the woman for my work, I came back from there and finished my junior WAEC.

Text_en: Before I could get the money, my uncle gave me some.
Text_ortho: Before I con go find money, my uncle con give me some money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Before I went to look for money, my uncle gave me some money.

Text_en: I went to register for senior high.
Text_ortho: I go register for secondary, senior secondary school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will get baptized in secondary school and in senior secondary school.

Text_en: From there I went to school until the last year, two thousand and sixteen, when I wanted to write the WAEC.
Text_ortho: Na dere I con dey go school, dey go school till last year, two thousand and sixteen wah wan write WAEC.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's where I was going to school, going to school till last year, two thousand and sixteen things are involved in the WAEC.

Text_en: Even sometimes, to pay tuition, I would, I wouldn't have the money to pay on time.
Text_ortho: Sometime sef, to pay school fees, I go con, I no go see money to pay quick.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Sometimes, to pay school fees, I would come, I wouldn't have money to pay quickly.

Text_en: So they would send me home.
Text_ortho: De go con dey pursue me dey come house.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They will come and chase me back to the house.

Text_en: I didn't go to school for like a week.
Text_ortho: Like some one week, I no go go school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: For about one week, I won't go to school.

Text_en: I said let me go and get a manual job.
Text_ortho: I say mah go find labourer work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said I should go find a labourer.

Text_en: Maybe I would get something to pay my tuition so my uncle could help me with the rest.
Text_ortho: Maybe I go fit get school fees wey a go pay so dat meh my uncle dey support me for di remain one wey I no get.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Maybe I could get money for school fees so that my uncle would support me in the remaining one I didn't have.

Text_en: I was working.
Text_ortho: I con dey do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was doing it.

Text_en: Until the time we wanted to write the WAEC.
Text_ortho: Reach di time when we wan write WAEC.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Reach the time we wanted to write the WAEC.

Text_en: I couldn't make money.
Text_ortho: I no con get money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I didn't have money.

Text_en: And my uncle didn't have any money either.
Text_ortho: And my uncle, e no con get money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And my uncle, he didn't have money.

Text_en: One of his in-laws was even sick.
Text_ortho: And one of im inlaw dey sick sef.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And one of his in-laws became sick too.

Text_en: All the money he had, he used for his hospital bills.
Text_ortho: All money wey im get, e con carry am go pay im hospital bill.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All his money he had, he took it to pay his hospital bill.

Text_en: From there, one day, I told my uncle "look at the WAEC, the WAEC is here."
Text_ortho: And from there, I con tell my uncle one day sey see WAEC now, e don come now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And from there, I told my uncle one day, "see, this WAEC, it's on the way."

Text_en: People had started registering.
Text_ortho: People don dey register.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: People have been enrolled.

Text_en: I never registered.
Text_ortho: Me, I never register.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Me, I haven't sat for the registration.

Text_en: So how will I take the exam?
Text_ortho: How me I go take write now?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: How can I write my exams?

Text_en: My uncle said well, if I didn't do it this year, I shouldn't get angry, I should go get a job and he too would try his best.
Text_ortho: My uncle say toh if me I no write dis year, meh me I no vex sey I go go find work do, and im too go try im best.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My uncle said well, if I didn't write this year, I should not wwik go look for a job, and he would try his best.

Text_en: The following year, I might be able to take the exam.
Text_ortho: Till next year me I fit go write.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I can go and write myself up to next year.

Text_en: I told my uncle "okay, let's see what God can do."
Text_ortho: I tell my uncle sey okay now moh dey see how God go do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I told my uncle, "OK, let me go and see what God will do."

Text_en: I was there hoping.
Text_ortho: I con dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was there.

Text_en: I had no job.
Text_ortho: Work no dey o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Work isn't available.

Text_en: I kept looking for a job.
Text_ortho: I find work, find work, find work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I looked for a job, looking for a job, looking for a job.

Text_en: There was no job.
Text_ortho: Work no dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Work isn't available.

Text_en: For almost half a year, I didn't find any job.
Text_ortho: Complete almost half a year, I no see any work do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I finished almost half a year without any work.

Text_en: One day, my uncle told me he'd seen a place.
Text_ortho: One day, my uncle con tell me sey im get one place wey im see.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: One day, my uncle told me there was a place he wanted to stay.

Text_en: I should let him take me there to work.
Text_ortho: Meh im carry me go dere mah go work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He took me there to go and work.

Text_en: I went.
Text_ortho: I con go dere.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I went there.

Text_en: After working for a month, at the end of the month, the woman should pay me.
Text_ortho: After work one month, month don end, meh di woman pay me money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: After working for a month and a month, she should pay me my salary.

Text_en: The woman said she didn't have the money.
Text_ortho: Di madam say money no dey im hand now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The madam said there was no money in her hand.

Text_en: I should wait a few weeks.
Text_ortho: Meh me I wait for some week.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I should wait for a week.

Text_en: I repeated "a few weeks?"
Text_ortho: I con say some week?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I said, "what week?"

Text_en: She said "yes."
Text_ortho: E say eh.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said eh.

Text_en: Years had passed, and the WAEC was coming up.
Text_ortho: And dat time, years don dey, time of WAEC don dey reach.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And at that time, the WAEC [Worship of the WAEC] is up.

Text_en: I said "okay, no problem."
Text_ortho: I say, okay no wahala now!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said, okay, no problem.

Text_en: I waited.
Text_ortho: I con wait o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was waiting.

Text_en: Until the day the woman wanted to pay me.
Text_ortho: Con reach di day weh di woman wan give me money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It was the day the woman wanted to give me money.

Text_en: She paid me and said well, I couldn't keep working.
Text_ortho: E give me money say toh me I no fit continue work again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He gave me money so I could not continue working again.

Text_en: I said "hey! What's the problem?"
Text_ortho: I say ah wetin be di problem?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said, "ah, what is the problem?"

Text_en: She said she couldn't keep owing me money.
Text_ortho: E say e no fit dey owe me money again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said he could not repay me again.

Text_en: That even for the work I just did, paying me was difficult.
Text_ortho: Sey di one weh me I work now, to pay for me, e dey hard for am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That the one uh... I worked for now, to pay for me, it's hard for him.

Text_en: I said "okay, no problem!"
Text_ortho: I say okay now, no problem!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said okay now, no problem!

Text_en: That was how I went back.
Text_ortho: Naim I con go back.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So I went back.

Text_en: This year I'm going to take the WAEC exam again.
Text_ortho: Con reach dis year again to go write WAEC.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then it was time again to sit for the WAEC.

Text_en: This year is the worst.
Text_ortho: Na dis year own ma con worse pass.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Is this year's one, worse pass.

Text_en: I haven't had any work this year at all.
Text_ortho: I no see any work do throughout dis year at all.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don’t have any work all this year at all.

Text_en: Even getting by is by God's grace.
Text_ortho: Even to succeed sef, na by, na by God grace.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even succeeding is by, is by God's grace.

Text_en: Now I am managing.
Text_ortho: Now I take dey manage.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm managing.

Text_en: Then I said "well, uncle, can't I take the WAEC exam this year?"
Text_ortho: I con say toh my uncle, dis year again o, I no go write WAEC again?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I said, "well, my uncle, this year again, I will not write the WAEC again?"

Text_en: My uncle said "well, he doesn't have any money."
Text_ortho: My uncle say toh money no dey im hand.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My uncle said, "well, there's no money in his hand."

Text_en: Taking the WAEC exam costs thirty eight thousand naira now.
Text_ortho: Sey WAEC now, na thirty eight thousand de dey write o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The WAEC [Worm Examination] now, is thirty eight thousand.

Text_en: I said that before I take the WAEC, I need almost fifty thousand.
Text_ortho: I say before me I go write WAEC now, de go hold almost like fifty thousand.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said before I wrote the WAEC, they'll hold almost fifty thousand.

Text_en: Let me register for the NECO and WAEC together.
Text_ortho: Sey meh me I register NECO, and WAEC togeder now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said I should register the NECO and the WAEC together now.

Text_en: Everything will cost a lot of money.
Text_ortho: Everytin go be big money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Everything will be big money.

Text_en: I said "okay."
Text_ortho: I say okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said okay.

Text_en: He said "what we will do is, at the end of the year, I will go for coaching classes."
Text_ortho: E say di tin weh we go do be sey if year don dey end me I go go for lesson.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said the thing we'd do would be that if the year is past, I'll go for a lesson.

Text_en: Let me go and take classes.
Text_ortho: Meh me I go take lesson.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I should go and take a lesson.

Text_en: I said "okay."
Text_ortho: I say okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said okay.

Text_en: There came a time, two months ago, when they were sitting for the JAMB.
Text_ortho: E con reach one certain time, last two month weh de dey write JAMB.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then at a certain time, last two months, the JAMB was written.

Text_en: I told my uncle "Well, the JAMB is here, can I go take it too?"
Text_ortho: I tell my uncle sey toh JAMB don come, I fit follow dem go write o?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I told my uncle that well, JAMB has come, can I go and write with them?

Text_en: My uncle said well, I could go take it.
Text_ortho: My uncle say toh me I fit go write.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My uncle said well, I can go and write.

Text_en: But he asked what I wanted to study there, since I did not know what it would be like.
Text_ortho: E say but wetin me I wan go read dere now wey me I never see how di tin go be.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said, "but what I want to read there now that I don't know how the thing will be."

Text_en: I said "well, I know a bit about computers."
Text_ortho: I say toh me I sabi operate computer small, small.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said well, I know how to operate computers.

Text_en: But before they start, they will teach us how to go about it and so we went there.
Text_ortho: So anyhow weh be before de go start, de go teach us lesson, how we go take do, how we con go dere.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So anytime they start, they will teach us lessons, how we will take... how we will go there.

Text_en: My uncle said I should go ask how much registration would cost.
Text_ortho: My uncle say okay meh me I go ask how much for di registration.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My uncle said okay, let me go and ask the amount of the registration fees.

Text_en: I went.
Text_ortho: I con go.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I went.

Text_en: They told me it is five, five, that is how they do it.
Text_ortho: De con tell me sey na five, five na im dem dey do am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then they told me that it was five or five they were doing it.

Text_en: Then I went to meet my uncle and told him the price.
Text_ortho: I con meet my uncle sey see di money weh de say de dey pay o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I met with my uncle and asked him, "look at the money they say they pay!"

Text_en: My uncle said okay, I should go.
Text_ortho: My uncle say okay now, meh me I go.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My uncle said okay, let me go.

Text_en: I should come, he would go borrow the money to give me.
Text_ortho: Meh me I come, meh im go borrow di money give me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said I should come, she should go borrow the money to me.

Text_en: I came and he borrowed the money.
Text_ortho: I con come, e con borrow di money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I came, he took the money.

Text_en: Then he gave it to me.
Text_ortho: Con give me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then he gave me.

Text_en: I went to register.
Text_ortho: Con go register.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then he went to register.

Text_en: After I registered, I took the JAMB exam.
Text_ortho: After register, con, I con write di JAMB.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I sat for the JAMB after I registered.

Text_en: After I took it, I was biding my time.
Text_ortho: After write di jamb now, I con dey now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: After I wrote the jamb, I was already there.

Text_en: So then, one day, my uncle asked about the result, and if I passed, where I would want to go afterwards.
Text_ortho: So my uncle con ask me one day sey dis result now, e say if me I collect now, where me I wan go now?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, my uncle asked me one day that this result... he said, "if I collect this, where will I go now?"

Text_en: Would I go to a university or would I go...?
Text_ortho: Sey me I go go university, or I go...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said I should go to university or I will...

Text_en: I said "well, even though I will go to university, I do not have my WAEC results yet."
Text_ortho: I say toh even though I go go university, I never get WAEC result o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said well, even though I'm going to university, I haven't got the WAEC results.

Text_en: "I can't go like that."
Text_ortho: I no fit go like dat o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I can't go like that.

Text_en: He said "okay."
Text_ortho: E say okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said okay.

Text_en: There was no money for the WAEC.
Text_ortho: Sey money now no dey to write WAEC.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said that there is no money to write the WAEC.

Text_en: I want to go to university.
Text_ortho: Na university me I wan go.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to go to university.

Text_en: I said "well, then let us see what God will do for us."
Text_ortho: I say toh moh dey see wetin God go do for us now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I say well, let's see what God will do for us.

Text_en: Especially, with the way our country is at the moment, we don't have anything anymore.
Text_ortho: And dis one wey our country now, notin dey at all again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And this one in our country right now, nothing is happening at all.

Text_en: Even people who are working for the government, they're complaining about not having any money either.
Text_ortho: Even people weh de dey work for government sef, de dey complain now sey de, money no dey deir own hand too.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even people who work in the government, they're complaining now that the... money is not in their own hands.

Text_en: Greetings, guys.
Text_ortho: Ah my people o, I dey greet una.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ah, my people, I greet you.

Text_en: So, I just want to talk uh... about uh... wife beating.
Text_ortho: So I just wan talk ehn about ehn women battering.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So I just want to talk uh... about uh... women battering.

Text_en: You do not understand what the women ba-...?
Text_ortho: Una no understand wetin di women ba-... ?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You don’t understand what the women ba-...?

Text_en: The, the, way they beat, beat women.
Text_ortho: Di, di way wey de dey beat, beat women.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The, the way they beat women, beat them.

Text_en: The way that they mu-.
Text_ortho: Di way wey de mu-...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The way they mu-...

Text_en: The way they do not even treat uh...women like human beings.
Text_ortho: Di way de no dey even dey treat ehn women as in like human beings.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The way they don't even treat uh... women like men.

Text_en: I really don’t know.
Text_ortho: I no know o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don't know.

Text_en: This really does happen a lot in Nigeria.
Text_ortho: Dat thing dey really dey happen for Nigeria well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That thing is happening in Nigeria very well.

Text_en: A person will get married, he will have a woman move in, he doesn't know he never liked the woman.
Text_ortho: Person go marry, e put woman for house, e no know sey e no like di woman before.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: A man will marry, he will put a woman in the house, he will not have any love for her.

Text_en: Why did he marry her then?
Text_ortho: Why e come marry am?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Why did he take her?

Text_en: That is what I just don’t know.
Text_ortho: Na wetin I don't just know.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's what I just don't know.

Text_en: Later, even if it's money he doesn’t have.
Text_ortho: Later, even if na money, e no get.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Later, even if it's money, it won't have any.

Text_en: And you just try uh... to do som-...
Text_ortho: And just try make you just eh do som-...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And just try to make you just uh... do som-...

Text_en: Even if it is leaving the house, you should even leave the house!
Text_ortho: Even if na to even leave di house, make you even leave di house!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even if it's to leave the house, leave the house!

Text_en: But it is uh... anger.
Text_ortho: But na eh vex.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's uh... wrath.

Text_en: You will just be angry, you will just be beating the woman everytime.
Text_ortho: You go just dey vex, you go just dey beat di woman everytime.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You'll just be angry, you'll just be beating the woman everytime.

Text_en: Sometimes, they will even just take a knife, and like stab the woman everytime.
Text_ortho: Sometime, de go just even carry knife dey, even dey as in chuku di woman everytime.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Sometime, they would just carry a knife to, I mean, chook the woman everytime.

Text_en: I just don’t understand.
Text_ortho: I no just understand o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I just don't understand.

Text_en: Wait, is it because women can't fight or do anything
Text_ortho: Wait na because woman no fit fight or anything.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Wait because a woman cannot fight or anything.

Text_en: And even in Nigeria, I don’t even know whether they, they really look into this matter.
Text_ortho: And for even Nigeria sef, I no even know wheda de dey even dey look into dis matter.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And in fact, in Nigeria, I don’t even know if they are looking into this matter.

Text_en: I just don’t understand.
Text_ortho: I no just understand eh.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I just don't understand uh...

Text_en: I just don’t know.
Text_ortho: I no just know.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I just don't know.

Text_en: This matter, it is just, it is becoming serious, it is happening more and more every day.
Text_ortho: Dis matter, e just, e don dey high, e don dey high, e don dey increase everyday, everyday by day.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: This matter, it's just... it's high... it's high... it's increasing everyday.

Text_en: I just don’t know what is happening.
Text_ortho: I no just know wetin dey happen.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I just don't know what's happening.

Text_en: The thing, it even leads to uh... uh... human uh... uh... uh... trafficking where a person will see a woman...
Text_ortho: Di thing, de con even lead to eh eh human eh eh eh trafficking wey person go just see woman...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The thing led to uh... uh... a human uh... uh... uh... uh... a uh... a uh... a uh... a uh... a uh... a king who just saw a woman...

Text_en: Even the, even we notice all this human traffi-, uh... trafficking, where they uh... carry uh...women.
Text_ortho: Even de, even de notice all dis human traffi-... eh trafficking, wey de dey ehn carry ehn women.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even they, even they notice all these people traffi-... uh... traffickings, which they carry uh... women.

Text_en: They will carry them, they will export them like rice.
Text_ortho: De go dey carry dem dey export dem as if no dey be rice.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They'll carry them out like rice.

Text_en: Are they rice?
Text_ortho: De be rice.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They're rice.

Text_en: Are they pencils to export and import?
Text_ortho: De be pencil wey de dey export, and import.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They are the pencils they sell and import.

Text_en: Even men, if they say they want to add men, it's one in ten.
Text_ortho: Man sef, if de say dem want put man, na one over ten.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: In fact, if they say they want to put a man in prison, it's a matter of one over ten.

Text_en: It is women who will s-, let's say they are uh... ninety nine uh...percent.
Text_ortho: Na women go s-... say de be come ehn ninety nine over ehn ehn ehn ehn ehn ehn ehn ehn ehn ehn ehn hundred.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Women will s-... say they will come uh... ninety nine over uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh...

Text_en: Women are one uh... percent.
Text_ortho: Women be one over ehn hundred.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Women are one over uh... hundred.

Text_en: Why?
Text_ortho: Why?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Why?

Text_en: They will just be using women, beating them anyhow.
Text_ortho: De go just dey use women, dey beat dem anyhow.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They will just be using women to beat them anyhow.

Text_en: I am saying Nigeria should look into this matter.
Text_ortho: I dey say make Nigeria look inside dis matter.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm saying that Nigeria should look into this matter.

Text_en: It is not good, it is not good.
Text_ortho: E no good, e no good.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's not good, it's not good.

Text_en: A lot of the time, this thing, it destroys families.
Text_ortho: Many atimes, dis thing, e dey spoil family.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: There are times when this thing spoils a family.

Text_en: If children, small children see this thing, it'll just increase every day.
Text_ortho: If children, small children go dey look all dese things, di thing go just dey increase everyday by day.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If children... small children look at all these things, the thing will just increase every day.

Text_en: If a small child just...
Text_ortho: If eh eh small pikin go just...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If uh... uh... a small child will just...

Text_en: We think that all these small children, they don't know anything.
Text_ortho: We dey think sey all dese small pikin, de no know anything.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We think these little ones don't know anything.

Text_en: I'm telling you, small children, they know something, but they know more than us because, at that time, there is nothing in their brain.
Text_ortho: I dey tell you sey small pikin, na dem know someting, but pass we wey be adult because, at dat time, nothing dey inside deir brain.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm telling you that a little child, they know something, but more than the adults because, at that time, nothing was in their brain.

Text_en: They don't think about anything.
Text_ortho: De no dey think of anything.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They don't think of anything.

Text_en: We're the ones who get all these things in our head.
Text_ortho: Na we go dey get all dese thing dey for our head.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All these things will we have on our heads.

Text_en: We will say "ah! We want to get work, I want to go to work, ah! This thing that I do for work, everything I am doing for this place, I need to go to Oshodi!"
Text_ortho: We go dey say ah we wan get work, I wan go work, ah di thing wey I dey do for work, di everything wey I dey do for dis place I need to go Oshodi!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We will say, "ah, we want to get a job, I want to go to work, uh... what I'm working for, everything I'm doing in this place, I need to go to Oshodi!"

Text_en: All these things are in our heads, but when it comes to small children, they don't have anything in their heads.
Text_ortho: All dis thing dey for our brain, but when e comes to small children, de no get anyting for deir brain.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All these things are in our brain, but when it comes to small children, they have nothing in their brain.

Text_en: So, anything that they see, that they hear, even if they cannot say anything, those things get wired in their brain even when they become adults.
Text_ortho: So anyting wey de dey see, wey de dey hear, even if de no sabi speak anything, dose thing dey hook inside deir brain even when dey mature.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So anything they see, which they hear, even if they don’t speak English, those things are working in their brain while they are mature.

Text_en: So, that's what is making this thing continue.
Text_ortho: So na wetin dey con make dis thing dey continue?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, what's causing this thing to continue?

Text_en: A child who says he sees his daddy beat his mummy, if that child grows up, do you want to tell me that that child will not be... be a wife uh... uh... uh... uh... beater when he gets married?
Text_ortho: Pikin wey go say e dey see im papa dey beat im mama, if dat pikin grow, you wan tell me sey dat pikin no go be, be wife eh eh eh eh eh beater when e marry?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: A child who will say he sees his father beating her mother, if that child grows up, you want to tell me that the child will not be uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... u

Text_en: That's how it will be now.
Text_ortho: Na so di thing go be now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how the thing will be.

Text_en: It will just continue like that, and the thing cannot stop.
Text_ortho: E go just continue like dat, and di thing no go fit stop.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He will just continue like that, and the thing will not stop.

Text_en: I say that charity begins at home.
Text_ortho: I dey talk sey charity, e begins at home.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm saying charity begins at home.

Text_en: Let us start this thing for, for, for our own self.
Text_ortho: Make we start dis thing for, for, for our own sef.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Let's start this thing for, for, for our own.

Text_en: Nobody will do it for us.
Text_ortho: Nobody go do am for us.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: No one will do it for us.

Text_en: It's us who will do it for ourselves.
Text_ortho: Na we go do am for oursef.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We will do it for ourselves.

Text_en: We will do it for ourselves.
Text_ortho: We go do am for oursef.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We will do it for ourselves.

Text_en: Nigerians, I beg you.
Text_ortho: Nigerians, I dey beg una.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm begging you, Nigerians.

Text_en: Let's act in a good way, don't let us spoil ourselves, but make at... at least, Nigeria better.
Text_ortho: Make una act in a good way, make we no dey spoil oursef, make, at, at least, make Nigeria just good.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We should act in a way that's good; we should not spoil ourselves, we should, at least, make Nigeria just good.

Text_en: When it comes to mo-, moral civilisation (if that's what I want to call it), let's just be good to each other, don't let us just be...
Text_ortho: When e comes to mo, moral civilisation (if na wetin I go call am), make we just dey good to oursef, make we no just dey...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When it comes to mobs, moral civilisation (if that's what I will call it), we should just be good to ourselves, not just...

Text_en: In fact, if it's our own family members, don't let us do bad to our own family members.
Text_ortho: In fact if na our own family member, make we no just dey do bad to our own family members.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: In fact, if it's our own family member, let's not just do bad to our family members.

Text_en: Thank you.
Text_ortho: Thank you.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Thanks be to you.

Text_en: I know that right now, they have even created...
Text_ortho: I know sey now sef, de don even create...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I know that right now, they created...

Text_en: It is good that they have created this uh... women empowerment uh... thing uh... for Nigerians, for Nigerians.
Text_ortho: E good as de don create dis eh women empowerment ehn thing ehn for eh Nigerian, for Nigerian.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's good that they have created these uh... women empowered uh... something uh... for uh... Nigerian... for Nigerian.

Text_en: And there is even one (I don't remember the exact name), which they have created for all this uh... uh... demoralisation of women, uh... demoralisation of uh... women and even children.
Text_ortho: And e get one sef (I no even remember di name sef) wey de don create for all dis ehn ehn demoralising ehn di woman, ehn demoralisation of eh women, and even children.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And there's one... (I don’t even remember the name) which has been created for all these uh... uh... uh... uh... the woman... uh... the uh... the uh... the sinful uh... women, and even children, they have created for all these uh... uh... uh... uh... the woman... uh... the sinful uh... women, and even children.

Text_en: So, when you see someone, if it is on your uh... uh... doorstep, if it is in your uh... uh... uh... uh... neighborhood that you see a man beating women (sometimes, they don't even care if it is outside, they will even strip a woman and beat her severely), don't just leave it saying uh... this thing is none of your business.
Text_ortho: So, when you see person, if na your eh eh dormot, if na your ehn ehn ehn ehn ehn side you see man dey beat women (sometime, de no dey even dey care wheder na outside, de go even naked di woman, beat am well, well), no just leave am say eh di thing no be your own business.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So when you see someone, if it's your uh... uh... doro... if it's your uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... if it's outside, they will

Text_en: It is!
Text_ortho: Na your own.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's your own.

Text_en: It's everyone's business!
Text_ortho: Na everybody business.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's everything for business.

Text_en: Because some people will just want to say "please, I don't wanna interfere in this matter".
Text_ortho: Because some people go dey go just want say I beg, make I no put mouth inside di matter.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because some people will just want to say I don't want to talk about the matter.

Text_en: If that man kills that woman in that place, don't you know that God will... will... will deal with you?
Text_ortho: If dat man kill dat woman for dat place, you no know sey God go, go, go handle you?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If a man kills a woman in that place, you don't know that God will, will, will handle you?

Text_en: God will deal will you, God will punish you because you were there and you did not stop it.
Text_ortho: God go handle you, God go punish you because you dey dere, you no stop di thing.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: God will handle you, God will punish you because you are there, you don’t stop the thing.

Text_en: If you can stop the man, stop him!
Text_ortho: If you fit stop di man, stop am!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If you can stop the man, stop him!

Text_en: And if it means reporting to where he needs to be reported, take him to the police!
Text_ortho: And if na to go report am to where de suppose to report am, pick am, go police!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And if it's to go report it to where it's supposed to report it, pick it up and go to the police!

Text_en: Go and report him to the police!
Text_ortho: Go report to police!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Go and report to the police!

Text_en: Because that thing is not good, it's not good.
Text_ortho: Because dat thing, no good, e no good.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because that thing is not good, it's not good.

Text_en: That's why I even like foreign countries.
Text_ortho: Dat'S why I even like di Oyinbo country sef.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's why I even love the white people.

Text_en: In some foreign countries, they don't allow anyone to touch uh... anyone.
Text_ortho: Some Oyinbo country, de no dey allow make person dey touch eh anybody.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Some Oyinbo countries don’t allow anyone to touch uh... anybody.

Text_en: If it is touching a child; if it is touching a uh... uh... uh... uh... wife, you are not su-, you don't... you cannot... you can't try it now, you can't try it, you can't do it.
Text_ortho: If na to touch eh pikin, if na to touch ehn ehn ehn ehn ehn wife, you no su-... you no, you no fit, you no fit try am now, you no fit try am, you no fit do am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If it's to touch uh... a child, if it's to touch uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... uh... your wife, you won't su-... you won't be able to do it now, you won't be able to do it.

Text_en: Please, when you see a wife, a wife, women, when any man beats you, go and report him to the police.
Text_ortho: Abeg, when una see wife, wife, women, when any man beat you, go report to police.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Please, when you see a wife, a wife, a woman, a man who gives you a blow, go to the police.

Text_en: This, go and report it!
Text_ortho: Dis one, make una go report.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Go and get directions.

Text_en: Report!
Text_ortho: Report!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Report!

Text_en: Whether it is your husband, he's not supposed to do that to you.
Text_ortho: Wheder na your husband, e no suppose to do dat one to you.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The husband is not supposed to do that to you.

Text_en: Thank you!
Text_ortho: Thank you o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Thank you!

Text_en: That's what I wanted to tell you.
Text_ortho: Na wetin I just wan tell una.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's what I want to tell you.

Text_en: Me, my name is Joseph Aseginmba.
Text_ortho: Me, my name na Joseph Aseginmba.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My name is Joseph Aseginmba.

Text_en: I come from a family of five.
Text_ortho: I comot from family wey na five of us.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I went from a family of five of us.

Text_en: Two are girls.
Text_ortho: Two, na women.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Two, women.

Text_en: Then the other three are boys.
Text_ortho: Den di three na boys.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then the three were boys.

Text_en: But later on, well, one of the girls she... she... died.
Text_ortho: But, later on, one of di female sha wan, wan, don die.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But later on, one of the women wanted... wanted... wanted... had died.

Text_en: Though only one of the girls remains here.
Text_ortho: Though na only one female con remain here.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Though there's only one woman here, here.

Text_en: And I come from uh... Plateau State in Nigeria here, which is in the Middle Belt.
Text_ortho: And I comot from eh Plateau State of Nigeria here weh dey Middle Belt.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And I left uh... Plateau State of Nigeria here in the Middle Belt.

Text_en: Uh... that's where I come from.
Text_ortho: Ehn na dere I comot from.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehn, that's where I left.

Text_en: And uh... in the long run, my father... my mother was the first to die, then my, my mother followed suit.
Text_ortho: And eh at di long run, my papa con, my mama first die, my, my mama con follow.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And uh... at the long run, my dad first died, my mom followed by.

Text_en: You understand?
Text_ortho: You understand?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You understand?

Text_en: So... and I am... then I... then I...
Text_ortho: So and I dey, I con, I con...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So and I was... I came, I came...

Text_en: After my National Diploma, I got a job at the National Open University.
Text_ortho: After my national diploma now, con get work for National Open University.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: After my national diploma, then I got a job in the National Open University.

Text_en: That's where you get the chance to hustle, they, they do some sign things.
Text_ortho: Na dere person dey get hustle dey, dey do some sign tings.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's the place where someone hustles and does some sign- making.

Text_en: They use it for school, in fact, they use it to help other families.
Text_ortho: Dey use am dey do school, dey use am dey help oder family sef.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Those who use it to school, helping other families.

Text_en: That's the hustling method.
Text_ortho: Na di hustling method be dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's the method of hustling.

Text_en: Abuja is a very good place to stay.
Text_ortho: Abuja na very good place to stay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Abuja is a very good place to stay.

Text_en: But the, the cost of living of the people in Abuja now, it's, it's high.
Text_ortho: But di, di level wey people dey live for Abuja now, na, na high level.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But the, the level people are living in Abuja right now is... is high.

Text_en: It's not a low standard.
Text_ortho: No be low level.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Isn't it low.

Text_en: But there are some ghetto areas.
Text_ortho: But di ghetto area dey o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But the ghetto area is there.

Text_en: It's not like there are no ghettos here.
Text_ortho: No be sey di ghetto area no dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Is there not the ghetto area?

Text_en: But, yet, the ghetto area is just like the city in my... in the place where I come from.
Text_ortho: But, still at dat, di ghetto area, e just dey like di city for my, for where me, I comot from.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But, still, in the ghetto area, it's like the city of my... where I'm from.

Text_en: You understand?
Text_ortho: You understand?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You understand?

Text_en: So... but staying in Abuja is, is the best... is the best thing to do.
Text_ortho: So but staying in Abuja, na, na di best, na di best ting to do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, but living in Abuja, it's... it's the best thing to do.

Text_en: Everybody wants to be in the Federal Capital City.
Text_ortho: Everybody wan make e dey Federal Capital.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Everybody wants to be in the Federal Capital.

Text_en: You understand?
Text_ortho: You understand?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You understand?

Text_en: But life in Abuja is very expensive.
Text_ortho: But life for Abuja is very expensive.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But life in Abuja is very expensive.

Text_en: Housing, transportation, food are very expensive.
Text_ortho: House, transportation, feeding, e dey very expensive.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: House, transportation, feeding... it's very expensive.

Text_en: And it's because of my father's death.
Text_ortho: And na di dead of my papa o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And he's the dead of my father.

Text_en: The m-... my own... the... my mother's death is not painful to me because in her case, she, she, she was sick for a long time.
Text_ortho: Di, m-... my own, di, my mama own sef, e no even pain me because dat one, she, she, she sick for long time.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The, m-... my own, the, my mother's own, it didn't even bother me because that one, she, she, she, she was sick for long.

Text_en: She co-... then she died.
Text_ortho: She co-... she con die.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She co-... she died.

Text_en: But in my father's case, he was not sick.
Text_ortho: But my papa own, e no sick.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But my father's, he's not sick.

Text_en: Nothing was wrong with him.
Text_ortho: E no do anyting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He didn't do anything.

Text_en: He just went out in the morning.
Text_ortho: E just comot for morning.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He just left early in the morning.

Text_en: He just came back.
Text_ortho: Just come back.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I just come back.

Text_en: He was not feeling well.
Text_ortho: E no dey feel well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He doesn't feel well.

Text_en: We took him to the hospital.
Text_ortho: Carry am go hospital.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Take him to the hospital.

Text_en: Before you knew it, he was dead.
Text_ortho: Before you know, e don die.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Before you know it, he is dead.

Text_en: So I was really surprised.
Text_ortho: So e con dey very suprising for me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So he was very suprised for me.

Text_en: Mstchew then I realised that anything, even what I was doing... I will just remember that this life is vain.
Text_ortho: Mtschew I con see sey anyting, even di ting I dey do, I go con remember di ting sey noting dey dis life.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Mstchew, I realized that anything... even the thing I'm doing, I'd remember the thing that there's nothing in this life.

Text_en: If you go out and come back without coming down with an illness and nothing is wrong with you, you should really thank God for that.
Text_ortho: If you comot come back say you no sick, noting do you, you really thank God for that.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If you come back and say you are sick, nothing is happening to you, you will really thank God for that.

Text_en: Pidgin is not a language that one can master completely now, but the little ones I know, I will say it.
Text_ortho: Pidgin no be language wey person go sabi finish now, but di little one wen I sabi, I go talk am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Pidgin is not a language you know well enough, but the little one I know, I will talk about it.

Text_en: Ehen.
Text_ortho: Ehen.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehen.

Text_en: Myself, uh... I come from a ghetto.
Text_ortho: Me, ah na from ghetto I comot from.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I came out from the ghetto.

Text_en: So Pidgin, at least, that's what we grew up with.
Text_ortho: So Pidgin at least, na wetin we don grow wit.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So Pidgin at least, that's what we've grown up with.

Text_en: You understand?
Text_ortho: You understand?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You understand?

Text_en: It's something we have been into since our childhood.
Text_ortho: Na wetin we don dey do since from childhood.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's what we've been doing from childhood.

Text_en: The, the Queen's English, we started learning it when we went to school.
Text_ortho: Di, di correct English sef, na when we go school we start to dey learn di English.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even the... the correct English, is when we went to school, we started learning the English.

Text_en: So it's a normal thing to speak Pidgin throughout life.
Text_ortho: So na normal ting to speak Pidgin for life.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So it's normal thing to speak Pidgin English in life.

Text_en: As for the current government, they are really doing their best for Nigeria.
Text_ortho: Pertaining dis government, den de really dey try sha for Nigeria.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Pertaining this government, then they really are trying in Nigeria.

Text_en: They are doing their best on the issue of corruption.
Text_ortho: De really dey try base on corruption issue.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They really try to get involved in corruption issues.

Text_en: Definitely, what they are doing is... it will really help the masses in Nigeria, but the people who will enjoy it... it's not time yet.
Text_ortho: Definitely, wetin de dey do, e dey, e go really help di masses of Nigeria, but di people wey go enjoy am no be now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Clearly, what they are doing is... it will really help the masses of Nigeria, but the people who will enjoy it are not here right now.

Text_en: It's later? the enjoyment will come later.
Text_ortho: Na later, later di enjoyment go come.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And later, the pleasure will come.

Text_en: Definitely, the government is doing their best.
Text_ortho: Definitely, di government, de dey try.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They certainly, the government, they are making an effort.

Text_en: They should keep it up, up, just as it is.
Text_ortho: Make dem keep am up, up as e dey like dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They should keep it up, as it seems right to them.

Text_en: And all these divisions in uh... Nigeria, the issue of Biafra, mtschew, I don't like it because if you check it [you'll realise] that in the Ea-... in the East, people are not... [there's] no, no infrastructure.
Text_ortho: And all dis division of eh Nigeria, Biafra of a ting, mtschew I no dey kuku like am because if you check am sey for Ea-... for East, people no, de no, no any infrastructure.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And all these divisions of uh... Nigeria, Biafra of anything, mtchew, I don’t like it because if you check it out in Ea-... in the East, people don’t... they don’t have any infrastructure.

Text_en: If they say they want to divide Nigeria now, where will they start?
Text_ortho: If de say now de wan divide Nigeria now, how de wan start am?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If they say they want to divide Nigeria now, how will they start it?

Text_en: They don't have a place to stay.
Text_ortho: De no get where de go stay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They don’t have where to stay.

Text_en: Everywhere, per se, is the secretariat.
Text_ortho: Everywhere, per se, na secretariat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Every secret place is secret.

Text_en: There is no...
Text_ortho: E no get...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She doesn't have...

Text_en: And in that place, they place high value on landed properties as if it's gold.
Text_ortho: And de dey value land like sey na gold for dat place.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And they value land as gold in that place.

Text_en: Ehen... if you take a look at the North now, most of them (for instance in this Abuja) most of them are selling water and pushing carts.
Text_ortho: Ehen if you con check di North now, most of dem (like for dis Abuja), most of dem na mai ruwa, mai barrow.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Uhuh, if you check the North, most of them (like in Abuja), most of them are mai ruwa, mai barrows.

Text_en: Okay, if they split now and they go back to the North, now, who will buy their water and barrow, huh?
Text_ortho: Okay if de con divide now, de con go back North, now, who go buy deir ruwa, and barrow eh?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Okay, if there's a division here, they'll go back to North, and who will buy their ruwa and barrow, uh...?

Text_en: Will they push their barrow there?
Text_ortho: Push deir barrow for dat side?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Pushing down their rods on that side?

Text_en: So let's just stay united... let's just stay together.
Text_ortho: So moh just dey unite, moh just unite togeder.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, let's just be united, let's just be united.

Text_en: We will move Nigeria forward.
Text_ortho: We go move Nigeria go forward.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We will move Nigeria forward.

Text_en: Mstchew I don't watch...
Text_ortho: Mtschew I no dey watch.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Mtchew, I'm not watching.

Text_en: At most, what will make me... I unwind by browsing.
Text_ortho: Highest, wetin go make me, wetin dey make me relax na to browse.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Above all, what will make me... what makes me relax is to scroll.

Text_en: We browse the net, chat, I mean we get to know different things on the internet, things I didn't know until now.
Text_ortho: We don browse, chat, as in get to know different tings, tings wey I no know before for internet.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We have travelled, chatted, and got to know different things, things I didn't know before on the internet.

Text_en: I will go and research.
Text_ortho: I go go research.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I went to do research.

Text_en: Ehn, the problem is just that...
Text_ortho: Ehn na just wetin di wahala wey...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehn, it's just the problem that...

Text_en: If I get tired, I'll go and relax with friends and come back to the house by ten o' clock.
Text_ortho: If I don tire, I go go gist wit friends, and come back house by ten.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If I am tired, I will go away from my friends, and come back to my house by ten.

Text_en: Should I start?
Text_ortho: I should start?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I should start?

Text_en: Okay, in this year twenty eighteen, man, I'm praying for God to help me.
Text_ortho: Okay at dis year twenty eighteen, omo I dey pray make God help me, helep me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Okay, in this year twenty eighteen, my mom, I am praying for God to help me, helep me.

Text_en: Help my business, help everything I do, even my de-, de-, destiny, even my father, even my dad, even my sister, even my future wife, even my girlfriend.
Text_ortho: Helep my business, helep everyting I dey do, even my de-... de-... destiny, even my fader, even my papa, even my sister, even my future wife, even my girlfriend.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Heleph my business, heleph everything I do, even my de-, de-... destiny, even my father, even my father, even my sister, even my girlfriend.

Text_en: Oh eh, God, dear God, help me in whatever I do.
Text_ortho: Om-... eh Omo God, Baba God, helep me in anyting I do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Om-... uh... Omo God, Baba God, heheled me in anything I did.

Text_en: Help me, hm... even in Enugu where I'm living.
Text_ortho: Help me, hm, even dis Enugu wey I dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Help me uh... even this Enugusi I have.

Text_en: Help me, even my boss, even whatever, whatever I put my hands on.
Text_ortho: Help me, even my boss, even anyting I, anyting wey I put my hand.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Help me, even my boss, whatever I... whatever I put my hands into.

Text_en: God help me, help me, help me.
Text_ortho: Omo help me, help me, help me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Omo, help me... help me... help me.

Text_en: This is my... this is my prayer.
Text_ortho: Dis is my, dis is my prayer.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: This is my... this is my prayer.

Text_en: Okay.
Text_ortho: Okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Okay.

Text_en: Okay, from now until...
Text_ortho: Okay from now to...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Okay, from now to...

Text_en: From thi-... from this, uh... January, till after January, I want...
Text_ortho: From di, dis eh January, till continue, from January, I wan...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: From the... this uh... January... to continue... from January, I want...

Text_en: From the... from January... from January to, for some... from January to February, God, help my, help my mom.
Text_ortho: From di, from January, from January to, for some, from January to February, God, help my, help my mum.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: From January... from January to... for some... from January to February, God, helped my... helped my mum.

Text_en: From February till March, help my father, from March to April, help my girlfriend, from April till December, help my boss.
Text_ortho: From February till March, help my dad, from March to April, help my girlfriend, from April to till December, help my boss.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: From February to March, help my dad, from March to April, help my girlfriend, from April to December, help my boss.

Text_en: Uhuh, in this country of ours, Nigeria, I am fed up with this Nigeria.
Text_ortho: Ehen for dis our country, Naija, dis Nigeria don tire me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Uhuh, in this country, Nigeria, I'm tired of this Nigeria.

Text_en: I wanna move.
Text_ortho: I wan travel out.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to travel out.

Text_en: I wanna go to Malaysia.
Text_ortho: I wan go Malay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to go to Malay.

Text_en: You see this, all the gu-... guys in Malaysia, uh... mtschew, I want to meet up with them.
Text_ortho: You see dis, all di Malay ga-... Malay guy ehn, mtschew I wan meet dem dere na.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You see, all the Malay ga-... Malay guy uh... mtchew, I want to meet them there.

Text_en: These guys in Malaysia are really making some money there.
Text_ortho: Dis Malay guy, de dey make am dere now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: This Malay guy, they make him there right now.

Text_en: I wanna go there.
Text_ortho: I wan go dere.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to go there.

Text_en: The guys in Malaysia, I want... I want...
Text_ortho: Na Malay guy I wan, I wan...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want... I want...

Text_en: I really want to be a Malaysia guy.
Text_ortho: I wan be Malay guy now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to be a Malay guy.

Text_en: I wanna make money in Malaysia.
Text_ortho: I wan make money from Malaysia.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to make money in mumu.

Text_en: Malaysia's where I wanna be.
Text_ortho: Na Malaysia I want.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to go for money in Makina.

Text_en: I'm tired of this country.
Text_ortho: I don tire for dis country.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm tired of this country.

Text_en: In fact, if I... if I... if I leave this country uh... mtschew, I'm not coming back.
Text_ortho: Infact, if I, if I, if I travel out from dis country ehn, mtschew I no go come back again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: In fact, if I... if I... if I travel out of this country uh... mtschew, I won't come back again.

Text_en: I'll stay there forever.
Text_ortho: I go stay dere for ever.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will be there for ever.

Text_en: This is...
Text_ortho: Dis is...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: This is...

Text_en: In fact, I'll marry a white girl.
Text_ortho: Infact, I go marry Oyinbo girl.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: In fact, I will take a wife of an oyinbo man.

Text_en: I'd even marry a Malay girl, a Malaysian girl.
Text_ortho: I go marry even Malay girl, Malaysia girl.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will marry even Malay, a Malay girl, a Malay girl.

Text_en: They are... they're fi-... they, they, they’re fine you know.
Text_ortho: Na dem, na dem fi-... na dem, na dem fine pass ehn.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They are the ones fi-... are the ones... they are the ones... they are more beautiful than uh...

Text_en: They, they're even better looking than Nigerian girls.
Text_ortho: Na dem f-... fine pass Nigeria girls.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They are f-... better than Nigeria girls.

Text_en: Even all this hardship in our country has started affecting our, our girls.
Text_ortho: Even all dis hardship wey dey for our country, im don dey affect our, our girl.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even all these hardships in our country have affected our... our girl.

Text_en: Okay.
Text_ortho: Okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Okay.

Text_en: So Malaysia, Malaysia re-... Malaysia remains my top option for now.
Text_ortho: So so Malaysia, Malaysia re-... Malaysia remain my option country now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, so, ma-... ma-... ma-... ma-... ma-... ma-... ma-... ma'am remain in my choice country.

Text_en: I don't have any other country apart from Malaysia.
Text_ortho: I don't have any oder country apart from Malaysia.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don't have any other country apart from Malone.

Text_en: I want to go to Malaysia, I need Malaysia, I need Malaysia's money, I need Malaysia, everything from Malaysia, even a Malaysian car.
Text_ortho: I want to go to Malaysia, I need Malaysia, I need Malaysia money, I need Malaysia, everyting from Malaysia, even Malaysia motor.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to go to Malijah, I need Malaysia, I need money, I need Malaysia, everything from Malijah, even cars.
