Text_en: I'm tired of Nigeria.
Text_ortho: Nigeria don tire.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Nigeria is tired.

Text_en: Almost everything in Nigeria is bad.
Text_ortho: Anyting from Nigeria is almost bad ting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Anything from Nigeria is very bad.

Text_en: I don't need Nigeria anymore.
Text_ortho: I no need Nigeria anymore.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don’t need Nigeria anymore.

Text_en: Thank you.
Text_ortho: Tank you.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I tank you.

Text_en: Yeah, I don't need Nigeria anymore.
Text_ortho: I don't need Nigeria anymore yeah.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don't need Nigeria anymore, yeah.

Text_en: Nigeria is crappy country.
Text_ortho: Nigeria is a, Nigeria is wowo country.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Nigeria is a... Nigeria is a wowo country.

Text_en: A crappy country.
Text_ortho: Wowo country.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Wow, a great country!

Text_en: I'm tired of Nigeria.
Text_ortho: Nigeria don tire me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm tired of Nigeria.

Text_en: Everything in Nigeria is bad.
Text_ortho: Anyting from Nigeria na wowo.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Anything from Nigeria is water.

Text_en: Noth-, nothing is good in this country where we're... nothing is good, not even the cars.
Text_ortho: Not-... noting dey good for dis country wey we dey, noting dey good even di vehicle.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: No-... nothing is good in this country where we are, nothing is good even for the vehicle.

Text_en: When it comes to celebrations, we can't pu-... have any?
Text_ortho: If e come to festivity, we no fit pu-... produce am?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If it's festivity, we can't pu-... produce it?

Text_en: When it comes to hospitals, oh!
Text_ortho: If e come to hospital, oho oh!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If he comes to the hospital, oh!

Text_en: My name is Joke Babatunde.

Text_en: I'm from Ondo State.

Text_en: I live in Ibadan.

EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want...

Text_en: I've lived in so many places.

Text_en: I wanna teach you a recipe I learned from my friend.
Text_ortho: I want teach you one kind of soup wey I learn from my friend.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to teach you a kind of dish I learned from my friend.

Text_en: It's eaten mostly by the Igbo people.
Text_ortho: Na Igbo people dey chop am pass.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's the Igbo people who eat it the most.

Text_en: The name of the dish is ofe nsala.
Text_ortho: Di name of di soup na ofe nsala.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: For the name of the dish is nsala.

Text_en: In the Igbo land, that means bitter leaf.
Text_ortho: For Igbo land, dat mean sey na bitter leaf soup be dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: In Igbo land, that means bitter leaf soup.

Text_en: The ingredients they use for cooking it are bitter leaf, palm oil... palm oil, pepper, salt... pepper, salt, meat, dried fish, stock fish, tripe (the thing that's peeled from a cow, which was inside a cow and was peeled off), ponmo [cow skin], ogiri [a flavoring made of fermented oil seeds] and Maggi [cubes].
Text_ortho: Di ingredients wey de dey take cook am na bitter leaf, palm oil, palm oil, pepper, salt, pepper, salt, meat, dry fish, stock fish, shaki (dat one wey dey peel for cow, wey dey inside cow body de peel am), ponmo, ogiri, and Maggi.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The ingredients they use to cook it are bitter leaf, palm oil, palm oil, pepper, salt, salt, salt, meat, stockfish, shaki, ponmo, ogiri, and Maggi.

Text_en: The dish, you'll first of all wash the bitter leaf... the bitter leaf very well.
Text_ortho: Di soup, you go first wash bitter leaf, di bitter leaf well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You will first wash the bitter leaf, the bitter leaf well, well.

Text_en: You'll wash it till the bitter taste goes away, so it won't be bitter in the dish.
Text_ortho: You go wash am sotay di bitter go comot so dat e no go bitter for di soup.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You are to wash it so that the bitterness will not make it bitter.

Text_en: Then again, we need something else.
Text_ortho: Den we need anoda ting again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then we need another thing again.

Text_en: We need uh... ede.
Text_ortho: We need ehn ede.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We need uh... ede.

Text_en: They call it ede in Igbo.
Text_ortho: De dey call am ede for Igbo.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They call it ede in Igbo.

Text_en: And it's uh... cocoyam.
Text_ortho: And na ehn cocoyam.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And it's uh... chocolateyam.

Text_en: So first I'll cook the cocoyam.
Text_ortho: So I go cook di cocoyam first.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So I will cook the first kassiaam.

Text_en: Once I've cooked the cocoyam, then I'll...
Text_ortho: If I cook di cocoyam, I go con...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If I cook the cocoyam, I will come...

Text_en: When the cocoyam is ready, I'll wash my mortar.
Text_ortho: When di cocoyam don done, I go wash my mortar.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When the cypress is done, I will wash my mortar.

Text_en: Then, I'll pound the cocoyam.
Text_ortho: I go con pound di cocoyam.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will pound the cocoyam.

Text_en: If I pound the cocoyam... they add cocoyam to bitter leaf because they want it to be thick, so it won't be watery.
Text_ortho: If I pound di cocoyam, de dey put cocoyam for bitter leaf soup because de want make e thick so dat e no go be water, water.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If I pound the cocoyam, they add it to bitter leaf soup because they want it to thick so it won't be water, water.

Text_en: So if I wash my bitter leaf... when I've finished washing my bitter leaf, I'll put, put water on fire, grind my pepper, and put it in.
Text_ortho: So if I, I wash my bitter leaf fini-... I don wash my bitter leaf finish, I go con put, put water for fire, grind my pepper, pour am inside.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if I... I wash my bitter leaf fini-... I have finished washing my bitter leaf, I will put... put water on the fire, grind my pepper and pour it inside.

Text_en: Then I'll put in my tripe, my meat, and my dried fish.
Text_ortho: Den pour my shaki, pour my meat, pour my dry fish.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then put in my shaki, put in my meat, put in my dry fish.

Text_en: I'll add my stock fish.
Text_ortho: I go put my stock fish.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will put in my stockfish.

Text_en: Once I've put everything into the pot, it will be boiling, I'll leave it so the pepper will really get into the meat.
Text_ortho: If I don put everything inside, e go dey boil, I go leave so dat di pepper go enter am well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If I have put everything inside, it will boil, I will leave it so that the pepper will penetrate it very well.

Text_en: Then I'll leave it to boil really well.
Text_ortho: I go con leave am make e boil well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'll leave it to boil very well.

Text_en: When it's boiled very well, I add my Maggi, add my ogiri, add everything, add the salt so it will taste good.
Text_ortho: When e boil well, well, I put my Maggi, put my ogiri, put everything, put my salt make e taste well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When it has boiled very well, I put my Maggi, I put my ogiri, I put everything, I put my salt to make it taste very well.

Text_en: So if I notice that all the ingredients are done, the pepper has gotten into the meat, and the tripe, and the cow skin, everything... then, I put in the bitter leaf.
Text_ortho: So if I see sey everything don boil, di pepper don enter di meat, and di shaki, and di ponmo, everything, I go con pour my bitter leaf.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if I see everything has boiled, the pepper has gone into the meat, and the shaki, and the ponmo, everything, I will pour in my bitter leaf.

Text_en: So when I've put in the bitter leaf, then I'll add my palm oil into it.
Text_ortho: So if I pour my bitter leaf, I go con put my palm oil inside.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if I pour in my bitter leaf, I will put my palm oil there.

Text_en: So when I've added my palm oil, everything will boil.
Text_ortho: So as I pour my palm oil, everything go con boil.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So as I pour my palm oil, everything will boil.

Text_en: Then I will leave it.
Text_ortho: I go con leave am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'll leave her.

Text_en: When I realise it's done, it has started entering... then I will put in my uh... then I will put in my, my ede.
Text_ortho: As I con see sey e don boil well, well, e don dey enter, I go con put my, ehn I go con put my, my ede.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: As I saw that it had boiled very well, it was coming out, I would put in my, uh... I would put in my uh... my ede.

Text_en: That's my cocoyam, which I pounded.
Text_ortho: Dat'S my cocoyam wey I pound.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's my cocoyam I pound.

Text_en: I will put it on the side.
Text_ortho: I go con put am inside.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'll put it in.

Text_en: So once it is done, within five minutes, when I notice that it is well done, I will take it off the fire.
Text_ortho: So once e just cook, within five minutes wey I see sey e don boil well, well, I go con carry am down.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So once he just cooked, within five minutes, when I noticed that it had boiled very well, I would carry it down.

Text_en: And you can eat this kind of sauce I'm talking about with pounded yam, you can eat it with fufu, you can eat it with uh... even your semovita.
Text_ortho: And dis kind of soup wey I dey talk about, you fit eat am with pounded yam, you fit eat am with fufu, you fit eat am with eh even your semo sef.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And this kind of dish that I'm talking about, you can eat it with pounded yam, you can eat it with fufu, you can eat it with uh... your semo too.

Text_en: But the dish... the dish is very tasty.
Text_ortho: But di soup, di soup dey sweet well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But the dish... the dish is really tasty.

Text_en: So this is the type of dish I know, and I want to teach you.
Text_ortho: So na dis type of soup I, I sabi wey I wan teach you.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So this kind of dish I... I know what I want to teach you.

Text_en: I want to talk about another dish which I know of.
Text_ortho: I want talk about anoder soup wey I sabi.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to talk about another dish I know.

Text_en: That dish, it's the Warri people... and uh... Warri people, and uh... Warri people, and uh... ban-... uh... the Bayelsa people who eat it very well.
Text_ortho: Dat soup, na Warri people and, ehn Warri people and, ehn Warri people, and ehn ban-... ehn Bayelsa people dey chop am well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Dat dish is for Warri people, and uh... Warri people, and uh... Warri people, and uh... ban-... uh... Bayelsa people are eating it very well.

Text_en: All these people who are in the Niger Delta are the ones who eat this dish.
Text_ortho: All dis people wey dey Niger Delta, na dem dey chop di soup.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All these people in Niger Delta are the ones who eat the dish.

Text_en: The name of the dish is banga
Text_ortho: Di soup name na banga.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The name of the dish is banga.

Text_en: And the ingredient they cook banga with is this palm kernel... palm fruit... palm fruit which comes from pa-... uh... palm tree.
Text_ortho: And di ingredients wey dem dey take cook banga soup na dis palm kernel, palm fruit, palm fruit wey come from pa-... ehn, palm tree.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And the ingredients used to cook banga sauce are these palm kernels, palm fruits, palm trees that come from pa-... uh... palm trees.

Text_en: So we will take fully ripe palm tree fruits, we will take them... take them and peel them.
Text_ortho: So we go carry di palm tree wey don ripe well, well, we go comot am, comot, peel am from di back.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So we will take the palm tree which has already ripe very well, we will take it away, we will peel it off the back.

Text_en: Then I will boil my, my palm fruits.
Text_ortho: I go con boil my, my palm fruit.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will boil my... my palm fruit.

Text_en: Then the ingred-... another ingredient which I need is Banga ingredient.
Text_ortho: Den di ingred-... anoda ingredient wey I need na banga ingredient.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then the ingred-... another ingredient that I need is the banga ingredient.

Text_en: You will just go to the market.
Text_ortho: You go just go market.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You will just go to the market.

Text_en: You will ask for Banga ingredients.
Text_ortho: You go say you want banga ingredients.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You will say you want to banga ingredients.

Text_en: Banga ingredients, you will get all those ingredients, they'll have pounded it for you, you'll have mixed it together.
Text_ortho: Banga ingredients, you get all those ingredients, dem go don pound am for you, you go don mix am together.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Banga ingredients... you have all those ingredients... they will have pounding it for you, you will mix it together.

Text_en: Then I need pepper.
Text_ortho: Den I need pepper.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I needed pepper.

Text_en: Then I don't need palm oil again.
Text_ortho: Den I no need palm oil again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I didn’t need palm oil again.

Text_en: I need salt, and I need Maggi.
Text_ortho: I need salt, and I need Maggi.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I need salt, and I need Maggi.

Text_en: Because once all those things are already in the dish, everything has...
Text_ortho: Because once all those things don dey di soup, everything don...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because once all those things have been in the dish, everything has...

Text_en: You don't need to add palm oil because the palm fruits will let out palm oil.
Text_ortho: No need of palm oil because di palm fruit go bring palm oil out.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And there is no need for palm-trees, because the palm-tree will give you oil.

Text_en: So if I cook the palm oil... then I will cook the palm fruits.
Text_ortho: So if I cook di palm oil, I go con cook di palm fruit.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if I cook the palm oil, I will cook the palm fruit.

Text_en: So once the palm fruits are well cooked, I'll boil it.
Text_ortho: So once di palm fruit cook well, well, I go boil am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So once the palms have finished boiling well, well, I will boil them.

Text_en: I'll boil it.
Text_ortho: I go boil am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will boil it.

Text_en: When I finish boiling it, I will pound it.
Text_ortho: When I boil am finish, I go con pound am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When I have finished boiling it, I will pound it.

Text_en: So once it is pounded, I will pour it into a mortar uh... this thing, wash it.
Text_ortho: So once e don pound, I go con pour am for mortar, ehn dis thing, wash am,
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So once it's pounded, I'll put it in a mortar, uh... this thing, wash it.

Text_en: Then I'll wash it very well with my hand, take out all the palm oil in it.
Text_ortho: Con use my hand wash am well, well comot all di palm oil inside.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I used my hand to wash it very well and thoroughly, extracting all the palm oil.

Text_en: So when I've taken out all the palm oil in it, then I'll set the palm oil on fire.
Text_ortho: So if I comot all di palm oil inside, I go con put di palm oil for fire.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if I take all the palm oil off, I will put the palm oil on the burner.

Text_en: As I set the palm oil on fire, I will add the pepper I planned to add... fresh pepper.
Text_ortho: As I put di palm oil for fire, I go con put di pepper wey I wan put fresh pepper.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When I put the palm oil on the burner, I will put in the pepper I want to put in fresh pepper.

Text_en: I'll pound it.
Text_ortho: I go don pound am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'll have pounded it.

Text_en: Or I can put it into it, I'll put in the Banga ingredients so that it will... everything will boil together.
Text_ortho: Or I fit put dry pepper, anyone wey I like as I want, want am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Or I can put in dry pepper, anyone I like, wants it.

Text_en: So when I've poured it in, I'll add the Banga ingredients so it will... everything will boil together.
Text_ortho: So if I pour am inside, I go con put di banga ingredients so dat e go, everything go con boil together.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if I put it inside, I will put the banga ingredients so it will, everything will boil together.

Text_en: So as all the ingredients boil, I'll...
Text_ortho: So as everything boil together, I go con...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So as everything boils together, I will come...

Text_en: Later, once it's boiled very well, when I realise that it is becoming thick and the oil has started coming up, that means that it's done, and I will add my meat.
Text_ortho: Later once e don boil well, well, when I see sey e don dey thick, di oil don dey show on top, dat mean sey e don done, and I go con put my meat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Once it has boiled very well, when I see that it's thick, the oil has come out on it, that means it's done, and I will put my meat in it.

Text_en: I'll add my meat, add my fish, add my stock fish, add my crayfish, add all ingredients into it.
Text_ortho: I go don put my meat, put my fish, put my stock fish, put my crayfish, put everything inside.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will put in my meat, put in my fish, put in my stock, put in my crayfish, put in everything.

Text_en: So once I've added all these things, and everything in the dish has boiled, that means the dish is ready.
Text_ortho: So once I don put all these things inside, and everything don boil inside di soup, di soup don do be dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So once I have put all these things into... and everything has boiled in the sauce, the dish is ready.

Text_en: So once the dish is ready, we eat it with starch.
Text_ortho: So once di soup don do, we dey use am eat starch.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So once the dish is done, we use it to eat starch.

Text_en: We'll prepare our starch, we'll eat the Banga with starch.
Text_ortho: We go do our starch, we go use banga eat starch.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We will make starch, we will use banga to eat starch.

Text_en: We can eat our Banga with uh...
Text_ortho: We fit use our banga chop ehn...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We can use our banga to eat uh...

Text_en: We can eat it with Akpu, we can eat it with rice.
Text_ortho: We fit use am chop akpu, we fit use am chop rice.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We can use it to eat akpu, we can use it to eat rice.

Text_en: If we don't have tomatoes, at times, we eat Banga with Rice.
Text_ortho: If tomato no dey, at times, we dey use banga chop rice.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If there's no tomato, at times, we use banga to eat rice.

Text_en: So that's the other kind of dish I know.
Text_ortho: So na di kind of soup again wey I know be dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, that's the kind of soup I know.

Text_en: My people, good evening!
Text_ortho: My people, good evening o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My people, good evening!

Text_en: Uh... my name is Kabiru Sule.
Text_ortho: Ehm my name be Kabiru Sule.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehm, my name is Kabiru Sule.

Text_en: I come from Kastina State.
Text_ortho: I dey hail from Katsina State.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm from Katsina State.

Text_en: My mother is an Edo w-... is an Edo woman and my father is a Kastina man.
Text_ortho: My mama na Edo w-... na Edo woman, and my papa na Katsina man.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My mother was Edo w-... an Edo woman, and my father was a man of Katsina.

Text_en: Uh... I am thirty three years old.
Text_ortho: Ehm my age be thirty three years old.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Uh... my age was thirty three.

Text_en: I was born in nineteen eighty four.
Text_ortho: Na nineteen eighty four wey de born me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was born nineteen eighty four.

Text_en: Uh... I want to tell you a story on, on how our establishment was kick started.
Text_ortho: Ehm I be wan give una tory on, on how our establishment kick start.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Uh... I want to tell you the story on how our establishment started.

Text_en: The thing started like uh... ten years ago.
Text_ortho: Di ting start like ehm ten years ago.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The thing started like uh... ten years ago.

Text_en: Uh... ninety... two thousand and seven.
Text_ortho: Ehm ninety, two thousand, and seven.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehm ninety, two thousand, and seven.

Text_en: Which means my mother likes to work out so much.
Text_ortho: Wey be sey, my mama like exercise well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Which means my mom really liked exercise.

Text_en: When she was young, before she even gave birth to us, she was an athlete.
Text_ortho: When she dey young young, before she even born us, na athlete she be.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When she was young, before she gave birth to us, she was a sportswoman.

Text_en: So, since she... since she's retired now and has given birth to us all, now she's set up the gym.
Text_ortho: So as she, as she come retire, come born us finish, she come set up di gym.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So as she... as she retired and gave birth to us, she set up the gym.

Text_en: Gradually, that is how we started.
Text_ortho: Small, small, na so we start o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We started right away.

Text_en: My people, for your...
Text_ortho: My people, for, na...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My people, for... it's...

Text_en: We started with four boys' quarters in our house.
Text_ortho: We start with four boys quarter for our house.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We started with four boys quarters in our house.

Text_en: Which means that if it rained, you would see the water get everywhere.
Text_ortho: Wey be sey, if rain fall sef, you go see di water go soak everywhere.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Which means, if it rains, you will see the water soak everywhere.

Text_en: That's how my brother and I, we were still little kids, (at that time, we were still in primary school) we would carry buckets of water with my mother.
Text_ortho: Na so me, my broder, small children (dat time, we still dey primary school) we would carry bucket of water wit my mama.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how me, my brother, small children (at that time, we were still in primary school), we would carry bucket of water with my mom.

Text_en: We would be carrying... we would be packing it.
Text_ortho: We go dey carry, we go dey pack am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We will be carrying... we will be packing it.

Text_en: We would pack the water, climb the stairs and throw it away, climb the stairs and throw it away.
Text_ortho: Pack am, pack am, pack di water, climb upstairs, troway am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Pack it up, pack it up, pack the water, climb it up and troway it.

Text_en: We would pack the water, and carry it.
Text_ortho: Pack water, carry o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Pack water, carry it.

Text_en: The same thing.
Text_ortho: Di same ting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's the same thing.

Text_en: We would just rinse and repeat the proccess.
Text_ortho: We just dey rinse, and repeat di proccess.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We are just washing, and repeating the proccess.

Text_en: So, as God blessed us, we started working hard. Then we started moving on.
Text_ortho: So as God come bless us, we come dey work hard, we come dey push am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So as God blesses us, we work hard and we push it.

Text_en: Before we knew it, we found a place we could rent.
Text_ortho: Before we know, we come find place wey be sey we go rent.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Before we knew it, we looked for a place to stay.

Text_en: But I'm in Kaduna now.
Text_ortho: But where I dey now, na Kaduna.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But where I am now is Kaduna.

Text_en: Now we're in Kaduna, in the North.
Text_ortho: Where we dey now na Kaduna, for di North.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We now have Kaduna in the land of the North.

Text_en: And in our stadium, there are places which they, which they are giving out, which they are renting out to people.
Text_ortho: And for our stadium, e get places wey dem, wen de dey give out, wey be sey de dey rent out to people.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And in our stadiums, there are places where they... they give out... where they rent out to people.

Text_en: So, if you want to get... if you have one package that you want to run (maybe sports; maybe it's a dance studio you want to run), you will pay the... you will pay the Kaduna government.
Text_ortho: So if you wan get, if you get one package wey you wan run (maybe na sport, maybe na dance studio you wan do), you go pay di, you go pay Kaduna Government.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if you want to get... if you have one package you want to run, maybe it's sports... maybe it's a dance studio, you will pay the... you will pay the Kaduna Government.

Text_en: The Kaduna government will give you the place for maybe five or ten years.
Text_ortho: Kaduna Government go give you di place for maybe five, or ten years.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Kaduna Government will give you the place for maybe five or ten years.

Text_en: So, that's how we sat down, then we opened it, and then we talked to a lawyer.
Text_ortho: So na so we con sit down, we come open am, we come talk to one lawyer.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So that's how we sat down, opened it, spoke with a lawyer.

Text_en: So, the lawyer now, as we were opening it, we... he asked us what name we would want to give it.
Text_ortho: So di lawyer now, as we dey open am, we, im tell us sey which name we wan give am?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So the lawyer, as we were opening it, he asked us what name we wanted to give him.

Text_en: What name do we want to give the business?
Text_ortho: Which name wan give di business?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Which name do you want to give the business?

Text_en: My mother said that...
Text_ortho: My mama talk sey...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My mother said...

Text_en: Because at that point, it wasn't like my mother didn't love me.
Text_ortho: Because at dat point, no be sey my mama no love me o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because at that point, my mother didn't love me.

Text_en: Uhuh, my people, my mother loves me a lot but her favorite is my brother, Muhammed.
Text_ortho: Ehen my people, my mama love me well, well, ehn but her favourite na my broder Muhammed.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehen, my people, my mother really love me, uh... but her favorite person is my brother Muhammed.

Text_en: So, as they asked her, then the lawyer...
Text_ortho: So as de come ask am, di lawyer come...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So as they asked him, the lawyer came...

Text_en: When the lawyer asked my mother what she wanted to call gym, she said, "Muhammed Gymnasium is what we want to name it."
Text_ortho: As di lawyer come ask my mama wetin you wan call dis gym, she come talk sey na Muhammed Gymnasium we wan give am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: As the lawyer asked my mom what you wanted to call this gym, she said we wanted to give it to Muhammed Gymnasium.

Text_en: Momo's Gym.
Text_ortho: Momo'S Gym.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Momo's Gym.

Text_en: Me, a grown-up, I didn't even have a problem with it like "ah, why didn't they name it after me?"
Text_ortho: Me, elder man, me, I no even get problem say ah why de no call am my name o?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Me, an elder, me, I don't even have any problem saying, "ah, why don't they call me my name?"

Text_en: Give it another name!
Text_ortho: Give am one oder name!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Give him another name!

Text_en: But at that point, me, I just knew that we were starting a business and we would not be packing...
Text_ortho: But at dat point, me, I just know sey we dey open business, and we no go dey pack...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But at that point, myself, I just know we're opening a business, and we won't pack...

Text_en: We would not be using buckets, water buckets to remove water from our gym any more.
Text_ortho: We no go dey use bucket of water, bucket to dey pack water from our gym any more.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We won't use buckets of water, buckets to pack water from our gym anymore.

Text_en: So, before we knew it, the lawyer said well, the place, the stadium where we were is called Murtala Muhammed, Murtala Muhammed uh... Stadium.
Text_ortho: So before we know, di lawyer come yarn sey toh di place, di stadium wey we dey is call Murtala Muhammed, Murtala Muhammed ehm Stadium mtschew.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So before we knew it, the lawyer said well, the place... the stadium we call Madtala Muhammed... Muhammed uh... Stadium mtchew.

Text_en: So, the lawyer said well, if we put my brother's name there, then it w-... it will be like this Murtala Muhammed owns the place.
Text_ortho: So di lawyer come talk sey toh if we put my broder name for dere, den e go, e go look like sey na di Murtala Muhammed wey own di place.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So the lawyer said, "well, if we put my brother's name there, then he will... it will look like the Murtala Muhammed, who owns the place."

Text_en: He asked how many children she had.
Text_ortho: Sey how many children she get?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She asked about the number of children she had.

Text_en: So my mother told the lawyer she had two sons.
Text_ortho: Naim my mama come tell di lawyer sey she get two sons.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then my mother told the lawyer that she had two sons.

Text_en: What is the other son's name?
Text_ortho: Wetin be oder son name?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: What is the name of the other son?

Text_en: Kabiru.
Text_ortho: Kabiru.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Kabiru.

Text_en: At the time, I didn't know whether the guy was just fooling my mother.
Text_ortho: At dat time, me, I no know wheder di guy just dey scope my mama o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: At that time, myself, I didn't know if the guy was just stalking my mother.

Text_en: He told her, "well, Kabiru. People don't really use Kabiru that way, for business."
Text_ortho: Im tell her sey toh Kabiru, de no dey too use Kabiru like dat for business.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He told her, "well, Kabiru, they don't really use Kabiru like that in the business."

Text_en: Use Kabiru for business, for business.
Text_ortho: Use Kabiru for business, for di business!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Use Kabiru in the business... in the business!

Text_en: So, that's how the story goes.
Text_ortho: So na so di story be.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So that's how the story is.

Text_en: How they started calling the place Kabiru Gymnasium.
Text_ortho: How de start to dey call di place Kabiru Gymnasium.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: How did they start calling the place Kabiru Gymnasium?

Text_en: It's not like it's really a fantastic thing.
Text_ortho: No be sey na one kind fantastic ting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's not a very wonderful thing.

Text_en: Because people, I have heard people say...
Text_ortho: Cause people, I don hear people dey talk sey...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Cause people... I have heard people saying that...

Text_en: That's how it is, my, my people, you should hear the story.
Text_ortho: Na so my, my people, make you hear di story o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how my... my people, let you hear the story!

Text_en: I was in the gym one day, I was working.
Text_ortho: I dey gym one day, I dey work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was in the gym one day, working.

Text_en: I know I have gone off course from what I was... wanted to tell you.
Text_ortho: I know sey I don derail from wetin I dey give you.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I know that I have left what I'm giving you.

Text_en: It's history but, I just do, want to tell you...
Text_ortho: Na di history, but I just do, want give you...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's history, but I just do... want to give you...

Text_en: It's one very good example now.
Text_ortho: Na one better example now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's a good example.

Text_en: There was a day I was working hard in the gym.
Text_ortho: E get one day wey I dey work hard for gym.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: One day, I was working hard in the gym.

Text_en: The clients that were there, who come to work out with us, they didn't know that me, I was, I was the owner's son.
Text_ortho: Di clients wey dey dere, wey dey come dey work out wit us, de no know sey me, I be, I be madam pikin.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The clients serving there, working with us, they didn't know I was, I was a madam's kid.

Text_en: And me, I don't like to show off anywhere I go.
Text_ortho: And me, I no like to dey show mysef anywhere I go.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And myself, I don't like showing myself in front of me wherever I'm going.

Text_en: I like to be humble, be quiet, without telling people that...
Text_ortho: I like to dey humble, dey quiet, make people no know sey...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I like being humble, quiet, so that people won't know that...

Text_en: So that way, you will, you will know who is who.
Text_ortho: So dat way, you go, you go know who be who.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So in that way, you will... you will know who is who.

Text_en: As I sat down, this one client was trying to get to know me.
Text_ortho: As I sit down, na so one client come dey meet me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: As I sat down, a customer came to me.

Text_en: Then he started telling me some funny gossip.
Text_ortho: E come start dey give me one kind gist.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He started giving me this kind of gist.

Text_en: I just looked at the guy.
Text_ortho: I just look di guy.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I just look at the guy.

Text_en: The gossip is that, he said, ahah!
Text_ortho: Di gist be sey e say a'ah.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The argument is that a'ah.

Text_en: He heard that the woman who owns this place (he didn't know she was my mother), he said that the woman who owns this place, that she only has one child.
Text_ortho: Sey im hear sey di woman wey own dis place (im no know sey na my mama), sey di woman wey own dis place sey na only one pikin she get.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said she heard that the woman owning this place... she didn't know she was my mother, that the woman owning this place had only one child.

Text_en: Ahah!
Text_ortho: A'Ah!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: A'Ah!

Text_en: I said, ahah, Simbo what's this guy saying?
Text_ortho: I say haba Simbo wetin dis guy dey talk?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said Haba Simbo, what is this guy saying?

Text_en: She has only one child?
Text_ortho: Only one pikin she get?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She had only one child?

Text_en: And she doesn't have a husband, and it's her boyfriend...
Text_ortho: And she no get husband, and na her boy friend...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And she didn't have a husband, and she was her boyfriend's friend...

Text_en: She is... she is sleeping with all these young men.
Text_ortho: She dey, she dey sleep wit all dese young, young men.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She was... she was sleeping with all these young men.

Text_en: And he's the one giving it to her.
Text_ortho: And na im dey give am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And that's what he gives him.

Text_en: My people, do you see this kind of problem?
Text_ortho: My people, you see dis kind problem?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My people, do you see this problem?

Text_en: I don't know...
Text_ortho: I no know.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don't know.

Text_en: Why rumours?
Text_ortho: Why rumours?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Why are rumors?

Text_en: Why do we really like spreading rumours?
Text_ortho: Why we too dey carry rumours?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Why do we make use of oaths?

Text_en: You don't have the facts.
Text_ortho: You no know your fact.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You don’t know your fact.

Text_en: You don't know anything.
Text_ortho: You no know anyting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You don't know anything.

Text_en: Now, I called this guy later on.
Text_ortho: Now I con call dis guy later on.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Now, I called this guy on later.

Text_en: The next day, I let him say all he had to say.
Text_ortho: Di next day, I leave am make im dey talk im talk.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The next day, I left him to talk his talk.

Text_en: We laughed all through.
Text_ortho: We laugh, laugh, laugh.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We laughed, laughed, laughed.

Text_en: Then the next day, I called him aside.
Text_ortho: Next day, I come call am aside.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The next day, I just threw her aside.

Text_en: I said, come let me...
Text_ortho: I say come, make me!..
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said come, let me...

Text_en: Ah, come on boss, come, let's talk, let's talk.
Text_ortho: Ah my, my, my chairman, come, moh we talk, moh we yarn!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ah my, my, my chairman, come, let's talk, let's talk!

Text_en: I then pulled him to one side and told him "look, that story of yours you heard, that you... that you were telling me yesterday... that story you told me yesterday, it did not please me."
Text_ortho: I come pull am to one side, tell am sey see dat your story wey you hear, wey you, wey you dey yarn yesterday, dat tory you tell me yesterday, di ting no sweet me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I pulled it down and told him, "listen to the story you're talking about yesterday, that story you told me yesterday, the story you told me, the story you told me yesterday, it didn't please me."

Text_en: "Because this gym, is my mother's gym."
Text_ortho: Because, dis gym, na my mama gym.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because this gym, it's my mom's gym.

Text_en: "First and foremost, she has children."
Text_ortho: First of, she get children.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She first had children.

Text_en: "She doesn’t have just one child."
Text_ortho: No be just one pikin she get.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She didn't just have one child.

Text_en: "She has several children."
Text_ortho: She get children.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She had children.

Text_en: "I am her last child."
Text_ortho: I be her last pikin.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The last of her children.

Text_en: "And me, talking to you, I am older than you by two or three years."
Text_ortho: And me wey dey talk to you, I senior you wit like two, three years.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And myself, who am talking to you, I am older than you for about two or three years old.

Text_en: "We have four more..."
Text_ortho: We get oder four...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We have other four...

Text_en: "I have four siblings."
Text_ortho: I get four siblings.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I have four siblings.

Text_en: "Some of them are married with children."
Text_ortho: Some of dem don marry, don get children finish.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And some of them were married, and had sons and daughters.

Text_en: "So... and the fact that... you were saying that she is chasing after young men, my mother is happily married."
Text_ortho: So and di fact wey be sey de talk sey she dey follow young men, my mama is happily married.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So and the fact that they said she was following young men, my mother was happily married.

Text_en: "My father is alive."
Text_ortho: My papa dey alive.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My father is living.

Text_en: So, that's how one thing led to another and I then I became good friends with this client.
Text_ortho: So na so one tin led to anoder, I con become good friends wit dis client.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, that was how one thing led to another... I became good friends with this customer.

Text_en: And uh... as God blessed us even more, we moved from Murtala Square.
Text_ortho: And ehm as God con bless us extra, we con move from Murtala Square.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And uh... as God blesses us extra, we moved from Murtala Square.

Text_en: God blessed us, then we bought our land and we built our structure on it.
Text_ortho: God bless us, we con buy our land, we come build our structure ontop am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: God bless us, we bought our land, we built our structure on it.

Text_en: Even today, this client still comes in, still comes to this gym and, he has become, like a part of our family now.
Text_ortho: Till today, dis client still dey come, still dey come dis gym, and im don become like family to us now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Today, this customer still comes, still comes to this gym, and he has become like a family to us.

Text_en: Alright, if you're listening to me, this is my own little story of how my first day of... at uh... school, Kaduna State University basically went.
Text_ortho: Alright if you listening to me, dis one na my own little parsee of how my first day of, at ehn school, Kaduna State University basically was.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Alright, if you listen to me, this is my little parabol about how my first day of uh... school, Kaduna State University, basically was.

Text_en: So a long time ago, I was hearing that the university is a big place where you come to, you know, and meet people, as in...
Text_ortho: So before, before I bin dey hear sey university na one kind big place wey be sey you just come you know meet people as in.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, before... before, I heard that university is one big big place where you just met people as in.

Text_en: My mindset towards these things is that you...
Text_ortho: My own mindset towards dis tings be sey you...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I think about these things is that you...

Text_en: Mstchew.
Text_ortho: Mstchew.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Mtchew.

Text_en: Then I explained, explained, explained.
Text_ortho: So naim I con explain, explain, explain.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So that was how I explained, explained, explained.

Text_en: I used the best English I could.
Text_ortho: I use all di whole grammar wey dey dis life o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I use all the English in this life.

Text_en: Must she even do the facial now?
Text_ortho: Must she even do di facial now?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Is it right for her to do this?

Text_en: Is it to show off?
Text_ortho: No be yanga she wan do?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She doesn't want to be yanga.

Text_en: It's pride for her husband now.
Text_ortho: Na yanga o for her oga now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm yanga for her boss.

Text_en: It's a shame.
Text_ortho: Na for her o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's for her!

Text_en: So her husband will see that her face is bright, that kind of thing.
Text_ortho: So dat her oga go just see her say her face dey bright, dat kind ting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So that her boss would just see her face bright, that kind of thing.

Text_en: Her husband will leave all those small small girls he follows right?
Text_ortho: Her oga go leave all dose small, small girl wey e dey follow abi?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She would leave those little girls she was following, right?

Text_en: That is what we do and do it.
Text_ortho: Naim we sha do, do, do am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So we did... did... did it.

Text_en: Then I explained everything I could, I used my best English every which way.
Text_ortho: I con speak all di whole grammar, grammar, speak all di English upside down.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I spoke all the whole grammar, grammar... speaking all the English upside down.

Text_en: Turned it, turned it, turned it.
Text_ortho: Turn am, turn am, turn am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Turn it over, turn it over, turn it over.

Text_en: Hey!
Text_ortho: Hey!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hey!

Text_en: At last, she agreed.
Text_ortho: At last, she con gree.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then she agreed.

Text_en: Let me give you the gist about what happened with me today.
Text_ortho: Make me con gist you wetin happen for my own side today now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Let me tell you what happened on my own today.

Text_en: What happened?
Text_ortho: Wetin con happen?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: What happened then?

Text_en: The day I was doing nails, one girl came from the village.
Text_ortho: Di day wey I dey do nails, one girl come from one village.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When I was doing nails, a girl came from a village.

Text_en: She was pretending to be a city girl.
Text_ortho: She con dey form sey she be city girl o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She was pretending to be a city girl.

Text_en: Sit down and let me do your nails for you!
Text_ortho: Sit down, make I do your nails for you!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Sit down, let me put my nails on you.

Text_en: These girls were snubbing me now.
Text_ortho: Dis girl con dey form level for me o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: This girl was playing tricks with me.

Text_en: Aha!
Text_ortho: Aha!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Aha!

Text_en: I now told her, "lady, which style do you want to do now?"
Text_ortho: Naim me con tell her sey babe, which level you dey now?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So I told her, "babe, what is your level now?"

Text_en: Then she showed me this one type of manicure on Instagram she wanted to do.
Text_ortho: She con show me one nail for Instagram say na dat nail she wan do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She showed me a nail on Instagram saying, "That nail is what she wants to do."

Text_en: Do you know who did the nails?
Text_ortho: You know who do di nail?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You know who did the nail?

Text_en: Who did them?
Text_ortho: Who do am?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Who did it?

Text_en: Tonto Dike.
Text_ortho: Tonto Dike.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Tonto Dike.

Text_en: Hee!
Text_ortho: Hi!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hi!

Text_en: She said she liked the nails, she was into that long one.
Text_ortho: She say she no, she like di nail, na friendship for dat long one.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said she didn't... she liked the nail, it was a friendship with that long man.

Text_en: Then I told her, "lady..."
Text_ortho: I con tell her sey babe...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I told her "babe..."

Text_en: A very long one!
Text_ortho: A very long one!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Long.

Text_en: Then she was looking at me like I don't know nails.
Text_ortho: She con dey look me like sey eh me, no sabi di nails.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She looked at me like uh... me, I don't know the nails.

Text_en: Then I told her, "lady, I know hairdressing, I know this work. I wasn't hired to do this work today."
Text_ortho: I con tell am sey babe, I sabi dis hair, I sabi dis work o, no be today dem don employ me for dis work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I told him, "babe, I know this hair, I know this job, I am not employing myself in this work today."

Text_en: So, when I told her that, she said okay, I should do the manicure for her.
Text_ortho: So as I con tell her dat talk, she con tell me sey okay, make I do di nails for her.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So as I told her that talk, she said okay, let me do the nails for her.

Text_en: Now she was bargaining.
Text_ortho: She con dey price o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She was really priceless.

Text_en: A manicure that we do for two thousand, she said she was going to pay eight hundred for.
Text_ortho: Nails wey we dey do two thousand, she con tell me sey na eight hundred she go pay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then she told me that her salary would be eight hundred.

Text_en: I said oh yeah?
Text_ortho: I now say shu!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said, "shu!"

Text_en: Oh yeah?
Text_ortho: Shu!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Shu!

Text_en: Where are you from now?
Text_ortho: Where you comot from now?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Where do you go from?

Text_en: Lady, we don't do that kind of manicure in this shop.
Text_ortho: Babe, we no dey do dat kain nail for dis shop o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Babe, we don't do that hairpin nail in this shop.

Text_en: Don't you know that our shop is a standard one?
Text_ortho: You know sey our shop standard.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You know that our shop is standard.

Text_en: Uhuh!
Text_ortho: Ehn!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehn!

Text_en: Then she said that she doesn't have enough money, this is what she has.
Text_ortho: She con talk sey toh she, she no get money o, na wetin she get be dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said well, she... she didn't have money, that's what she had.

Text_en: Then I said, "okay, since you don't have the money, go and see my management, because I don't have the right to reduce the price for you."
Text_ortho: Naim I con tell am sey toh unto sey you no get money o, go meet my management because me, no get right to reduce price for you.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I told him, "well, since you don't have money, go to my management because I don't have the right to reduce the price."

Text_en: Aha!
Text_ortho: Aha!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Aha!

Text_en: That was how we talked.
Text_ortho: Na so we be yarn.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how we're talking.

Text_en: We went on and on talking.
Text_ortho: We be yarn, yarn, yarn, yarn
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We're yarning, yarning, yarning, yarning, yarn.

Text_en: Until the lady went to meet the management.
Text_ortho: Sotay di girl con go meet management.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So the girl went to management.

Text_en: Then they reduced the price for her.
Text_ortho: Dem con reduce money for her o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They cut the money off her.

Text_en: She tried.
Text_ortho: She try o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She did well.

Text_en: When they finished the hair, she liked it.
Text_ortho: When dem con finish di hair, na so she con like am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When they finished the hair, that was how she liked it.

Text_en: Is that so?
Text_ortho: Shu!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Shu!

Text_en: Now she was li-... behaving as if she were a big celebrity.
Text_ortho: She con dey do li-... feel herself like sey she be celebrity too much.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She started acting like li-... felt like she was an a celestial star.

Text_en: She was bringing her nails here, I saw her shouting hallelujah.
Text_ortho: She con dey carry her nails for here, I dey see her now dey shout hallelluyah.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She was carrying her nails here, I saw her shouting hallelluyah.

Text_en: She was... she was doing selfies, Skyping, everything, everything.
Text_ortho: Con dey, she con dey do selfie, dey do, dey do all dese Skype, everything, gbogbo ti gbo gbo.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then she started taking selfies, she was doing, she was using all these apps, everything, gbogbo ti gbogbo.

Text_en: That girl... that lady was no good at all.
Text_ortho: Dat girl, dat babe, no try at all.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That girl, that babe, don't do anything at all.

Text_en: That's how it all came to an end.
Text_ortho: Na so di matter take end.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how the matter went on.

Text_en: Hm.
Text_ortho: Hm.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hm.

Text_en: So as it is now, the manager knew.
Text_ortho: So as e be now, manager con know.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So as it was, the manager knew.

Text_en: I also told her, "okay, you don't have enought money, do the one you can afford, do the one that you can afford."
Text_ortho: Me too, I con tell her sey okay o, you no get money, do di one wey your money reach, do the one wey your money reach o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Me too, I told her, "okay, you don't have money, do what your money is, do what your money is."

Text_en: Then she said no, she's not doing that; the one she wants is the one she needs to do.
Text_ortho: She con say so she, she no go do dat one o, na dat one wey she, she want, na im she, she must do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then she said, "so she... she won't do that, that's what she... she wants, that's what she must do."

Text_en: Then management told her we don't do manicures for eight hundred in this shop.
Text_ortho: Management con tell her sey we no dey do nails of eight hundred for dis shop o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then management told her, "we don't do eight hundred nails in this shop."

Text_en: That was how she agreed to pay two thousand naira.
Text_ortho: Na so she con gree, she con tell me sey okay she, she go pay two thousand.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She agreed, she told me that okay, she will pay two thousand.

Text_en: Hm!
Text_ortho: Hm!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hm!

Text_en: Even the two thousand as well, she said she didn't have enough money and she'd come back and pay the balance.
Text_ortho: Even di two thousand sef, she con say she never even get money to con balance, sey she go come balance us be dat o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even the two thousand, she said she didn't even have money to balance... she would balance us.

Text_en: You can imagine.
Text_ortho: You can imagine.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You can imagine.

Text_en: That was how she sat down... sat down to finish the nails.
Text_ortho: Na so she con sit down, sit down, do di nails finish.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She sat down, she sat down and finished the nails.

Text_en: Aha!
Text_ortho: Aha!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Aha!

Text_en: When I finished the nails, I was wondering where the girl came from.
Text_ortho: As I con finish di nails, I con dey wonder sey where dis girls comot from?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When I had finished stitching the nails, I was wondering where these girls came from?

Text_en: So I asked her, "sister, excuse me, where are you from?"
Text_ortho: I con ask her sey sister, abeg no vex o, where you comot from?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I asked her, "so don't be angry, where do you leave?"

Text_en: She said she was from Ibadan.
Text_ortho: She say na Ibadan she from.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said she's from Ibadan.

Text_en: I said "aha! It's a shame! It's a shame!"
Text_ortho: I say aha oga o, oga o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said, "aha, boss!"

Text_en: Haha.
Text_ortho: Haha.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Haha.

Text_en: She said...
Text_ortho: She say...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said...

Text_en: I said "which part of Ibadan?"
Text_ortho: I say which part of Ibadan?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said which part of Ibadan?

Text_en: Ibadan!
Text_ortho: Ibadan!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ibadan!

Text_en: She said ah.
Text_ortho: She said ah.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said, "ah."

Text_en: She said it's a kind of...
Text_ortho: She say na one kind...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said it was one kind...

Text_en: Challenge, all those uh... Molete people.
Text_ortho: Challenge, all dose eh Molete people.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Challenges, all those uh... Moletites.

Text_en: She, she said a kind of... a kind of name that I just don't...
Text_ortho: She, she con call one kind, one kind name like dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She... she called a kind, kind of name like that.

Text_en: I just didn't...
Text_ortho: I no just...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I just...

Text_en: Or is it Iwo road?
Text_ortho: Abi na Iwo road?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Or is it the Iwo way?

Text_en: All, all those people are bush people.
Text_ortho: All, all dose people sef, dem be bush people o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All, all those people, they're bush people.

Text_en: You should see the kind of fake nails she was wearing.
Text_ortho: As in con see di kind knuckles wey full di girl nails ba!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I mean, look at the nails on the girl's nails, right?

Text_en: Haha!
Text_ortho: Haha!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Haha!

Text_en: She has bleached [her skin] completely.
Text_ortho: She don bleach her life finish o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She has finished bleaching her life!

Text_en: Hey, I can imagine.
Text_ortho: Hey, I can imagine.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hey, I can imagine.

Text_en: Her hands were bony!
Text_ortho: Knuckles full her hand!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Her hands were covered with kuckles!

Text_en: She was like uh... coke and fanta.
Text_ortho: E be like ehn coke, and fanta.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's like uh... a coke, and a fanta.

Text_en: Jesus!
Text_ortho: Jesus!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Jesus!

Text_en: No, it was like burnt plantain.
Text_ortho: No, e be like burn plantain.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: No, it is a burned plant.

Text_en: You know like burnt plantain, that's what her hand is like.
Text_ortho: You know as plantain wey dey burn dey, na so her hand dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You know that as a plant is burned, so is her hand.

Text_en: Hmhm!
Text_ortho: Hmhm!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hmhm!

Text_en: Oh babe, that's why I said look at this girl!
Text_ortho: Oh omo, na so I say dis girl!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Oh, omo, that's how I said to this girl!

Text_en: Haha!
Text_ortho: Haha!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Haha!

Text_en: I wanted to take a picture of her nails.
Text_ortho: I wan snap her nails o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I want to snap her nails.

Text_en: That was how she told me that ah, I should not take a picture of her nails.
Text_ortho: Na so she con tell me sey ah meh I no snap her nails o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She told me "ah, I shouldn't snap her nails."

Text_en: She said if I shoot her nails, her knuckles will be showing.
Text_ortho: She say meh I no snap her nails o, sey if I snap her nails, her knuckles go dey show.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She said I shouldn't snap her nails, that if I snap her nails, her kuckles will come out.

Text_en: I now said "babe, I'm taking a picture of the nails because if I don't, my customers that are coming won't see my work."
Text_ortho: Naim I con say babe, me I dey snap nails o, but I no snap nails, my customers wey dey come, dem no go see my work o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I said, "babe, I'm snapping nails, but I'm not snapping nails, my customers who are coming won't see my work."

Text_en: That was how she...
Text_ortho: Na so she come...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She came...

Text_en: I told her not to worry because my phone, the kind of camera I have on my phone, the camera will clear all the knuckles, all the all the defects that she has on her hand.
Text_ortho: I con tell her sey make she no worry, di camera wey I get for my phone, di camera go clear all di knuckles, all di yama, yama wey she get for her hand.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then I told her not to worry, the camera I have on my phone, the camera will clear all the knuckles, all the disgusting things she has in her hand.

Text_en: All the defects on the nails.
Text_ortho: All di whole yama, yama wey dey di nails.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All the disgusting things on the nails.

Text_en: So she agreed.
Text_ortho: Na so she con gree o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She agreed.

Text_en: I finished and she posted it on Instagram, Facebook, Whatsapp, everywhere.
Text_ortho: I finish, she con post am out for Instagram, Facebook, Whatsapp, Everywhere.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I finished... she posted her on Instagram, Facebook, Whatsapp, Everywhere.

Text_en: Just look at the nails!
Text_ortho: Just dey see di nail!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Just look at the nail!

Text_en: She was just feeling proud that day.
Text_ortho: She just dey feel herself dat day o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She was just feeling herself that day.

Text_en: Babe, it's no small thing.
Text_ortho: Omo, no be small thing.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Omo, it's no small thing.

Text_en: So her friend said she liked the nails.
Text_ortho: Na so her friends ma follow talk sey she ma she like di nails.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Her friends also said that she liked the nails.

Text_en: Hm!
Text_ortho: Hm.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hm.

Text_en: Then she came to do it.
Text_ortho: She ma con do am o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She just did it.

Text_en: Her, she didn't have any money, so I should also do the manicure for eight hundreed naira for that one, that day.
Text_ortho: Her own, she no get money so dat I should do eight hundred naira nails for dat one dat day.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She's her own, she doesn't have money so I can make eight hundred naira nails for her on that day.

Text_en: Eight hundred?
Text_ortho: Eight hundred?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Eight hundred?

Text_en: She can't agree to... mstchew!
Text_ortho: She no fit mstchew!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She can't mstchew!

Text_en: mstchew!
Text_ortho: Mstchew!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Mstchew!

Text_en: Please!
Text_ortho: Kai!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Kai!

Text_en: A manicure that we do for one thousand five hundred I did for her eight hundred!
Text_ortho: Nails wey we dey do one five hundred, I do am for am eight hundred.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: For eight hundred naira, we made a profit out of the five hundred we had worked for.

Text_en: Just to maintain a relationship with the customers, mstchew.
Text_ortho: Base on sey make we just maintain relationship for customer level o mstchew.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Base on our relationship with our customers, mstchew.

Text_en: Hm!
Text_ortho: Hm!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hm!

Text_en: Man, that's how the matter is.
Text_ortho: Omo, na so di matter be o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Omo, that's how the matter is.

Text_en: It's a shame!
Text_ortho: Na wa o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's true!

Text_en: So, as it is now, the thing has...
Text_ortho: So as e be now, matter don...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So as it is right now, the issue has...

Text_en: Management told her... told me that she had come before!
Text_ortho: Management con tell her sey, tell me sey she don come before sha!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then the management told her, "well, tell me she's come again!"

Text_en: So, that was how she kept bargaining.
Text_ortho: So na so she price, price, price, price.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So she gave a price, a price, a price.

Text_en: In fact, the day she came to fix her hair, that was how she paid.
Text_ortho: Infact di day she con fix her hair, na so she price o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: In fact, the day she fixed her hair, that's the price.

Text_en: Hm!
Text_ortho: Hm!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hm!

Text_en: She can haggle, she is the best haggler in Africa!
Text_ortho: She dey price o, dey price for Africa.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She's offering a lot of money in Africa.

Text_en: As if!
Text_ortho: As in!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I mean!

Text_en: Paying five hundred naira for a haircut!
Text_ortho: Dey price hair five hundred!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Buy hair for five hundred naira!

Text_en: Can you imagine?
Text_ortho: Can you imagine?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: How can you imagine?

Text_en: They say that in Lagos, that under a bridge, they do hairdressing for five hundred.
Text_ortho: De say na Lagos, sey under bridge, de dey do hair five hundred.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They say it's Lagos, that under the bridge, they make five hundred hairs.

Text_en: Aha!
Text_ortho: Aha!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Aha!

Text_en: Can you imagine?
Text_ortho: Can you imagine?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: How can you imagine?

Text_en: What kind of girls are those?
Text_ortho: Which kain girls be dose ones?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Whose girls are those?

Text_en: They are Jews.
Text_ortho: Na Jew girls.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Na the daughters of the Jews.

Text_en: Ah!
Text_ortho: Ah!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ah!

Text_en: You know that those Jew girls, they are the ones who pretend they are Jews.
Text_ortho: You know sey dose Jew girls, na im de form sey dem be Jew girl.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You know that those Jewish girls are the ones who pretend to be a Jew.

Text_en: Jews?
Text_ortho: Jew?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Jew?

Text_en: They'll pretend they're city girls so that you know, when they enter a big place like this, they'll know that they're babes.
Text_ortho: De go do like sey de be city girls so dat you know when dey enter big place like dis ba, dem go know sey ah na babe be dis.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They will act like they're city girls, so that you know when they go into a big place like this, they will know that ah, this is babe.

Text_en: They won't know that nothing can fix them.
Text_ortho: Dem no go know sey na noting gum dem.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They won't know that it's nothing against them.

Text_en: Nothing can fix them.
Text_ortho: Sapain no gum dem.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Saphain did not make a meal of them.

Text_en: One naira won't fix their butts like this!
Text_ortho: One naira no gum deir yansh like dis!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: One naira without gums like this!

Text_en: Mstchew, hm!
Text_ortho: Mstchew hm!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Mstchew hm!

Text_en: My name is Bukola Ayaniyi.
Text_ortho: My name na Bukola Ayaniyi.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My name is Bukola Ayaniyi.

Text_en: I'm an authority in soap making.
Text_ortho: I be ogbonge madam for soap making.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm ogbonge madam, who like soap making.

Text_en: I make soap because I don't wanna steal, and I don't wanna be a liability to my husband.
Text_ortho: I dey make soap because I no wan steal, and I no wan be liability for my oga.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I make soap because I don’t want to steal, and I don’t want to be a liability to my boss.

Text_en: I'm just making the soap, I'm not the one who invented the soap making process.
Text_ortho: And as I dey do di soap, no be sey na me originate di soap before.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And as I do the soap, it's not that I'm the one who started the soap.

Text_en: A long time ago, I had a shop where I sold basic products.
Text_ortho: Before, before I get shop where I dey sell provision.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Before... before I had a shop where I sold my belongings.

Text_en: But later on, things went bad.
Text_ortho: But later on, tings do as e wan do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But later on, things went as he wanted.

Text_en: And myself, I can't just sit idle.
Text_ortho: And me I no fit siddon idle.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And myself, I can't sit down and idle.

Text_en: That's why one of my friends whose name is Mama Funmi (she is my best friend)... so she told me that her brother was taught how to make soap in their church.
Text_ortho: Dat'S why one of my friend wey im name be Mama Funmi (na my better friend) naim come tell me sey im broda, de don teach am soap for deir church.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's why one of my friends named Mama Funmi... is my good friend, told me that his brother has taught him soap in their church.

Text_en: So since he was taught about it, he gave me the manual to read.
Text_ortho: So as de come teach am, e come carry di manual give me say make I go read.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So as they taught him, he took the textbook to me, saying I should go read it.

Text_en: When I finished reading it, I went to buy the ingredients.
Text_ortho: After I read am finish, na so I go buy materials.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: After I have read it all, I will buy materials.

Text_en: So the ingredients for making soap starts with sulphuric acid.
Text_ortho: So di material for making soap start from sulphuric acid.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So the soap-making was made of sulphuric acid.

Text_en: The second one is Texapon.
Text_ortho: Di second one na Tezapen.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The second Tezapenes.

Text_en: The third one is s-... uh... caustic soda.
Text_ortho: Third one na s-... eh caustic soda.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The third one is s-... uh... caustic soda.

Text_en: The fourth one is ST-... STPP.
Text_ortho: Di fourth one, na ST-... STPP.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The fourth one is ST-... STPP.

Text_en: Soda ash, nitrosol, perfume, liquid gel, or foam booster, or formalin, with colour, and perfume.
Text_ortho: Soda ash, Nitrosol, perfume, liquid gel, or foam booster, or formalin, wit colour, and perfume.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Soda ash, nisol, perfumes, liquid liquid, or foam, or formal, all of them in good shape and smell.

Text_en: That was how I started mixing soap.
Text_ortho: Na so I start to dey mix soap.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how I started mixing soap.

Text_en: And I thank God that even though I haven't had as much business I wanted, at least I'm putting some bread on the table for my children.
Text_ortho: And I thank God sey even dough de never dey patronize me as I want, but at least, I still dey put something for table for my children.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And I thank God that even though they haven't been patronizing me as I wanted, at least, I still put something on the table for my children.

Text_en: And I don't...
Text_ortho: And I no...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And I don't...

Text_en: That my clothes won't get dirty and the whole house won't be smelling.
Text_ortho: No be sey all my cloth go come dirty for house wey house go dey smell.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Not that all my clothes will come to an unclean place in a house where there is a smell.

Text_en: I wash as I like.
Text_ortho: I dey wash as I like.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I washed as I liked.

Text_en: My children wash too.
Text_ortho: My children dey wash.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My children are washing themselves.

Text_en: We're clean.
Text_ortho: We dey clean.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We're clean.

Text_en: Even my scent, my scent is fantastic because I add an exotic perfume to it.
Text_ortho: My odour sef, my body odour na correct one because I dey put am correct perfume.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My other, my body, is a true one, because I put the best oil in it.

Text_en: The perfumes I put into it range from Ambi Pur.
Text_ortho: Di perfume wey I dey put start from ambipur.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My perfume was made from ambipur.

Text_en: I put in lemon fruit, I put in uh... flavor, and some other perfumes.
Text_ortho: I dey put lemon fruit, I dey put eh banana flavour, and so oda perfume like dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I put in lemon fruit, I put in uh... banana, and so other spices like that.

Text_en: This means if anyone opens up my soap and sniffs it, they will ti-... they will know it's a good one.
Text_ortho: Wey be sey if anybody open my soap, smell am, e go ti-... e go see sey dis one na correct one.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Which means that if anyone opens my soap and smells it, he will ti-... he will see that this is a correct one.

Text_en: And my soap doesn't ruin clothes, it doesn't wash the color off clothes, it makes clothes better.
Text_ortho: And my soap e no dey spoil cloth, e no dey wash cloth, e dey make cloth beta.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And my soap doesn't spoil cloth, it doesn't wash cloth, it makes the cloth hard.

Text_en: You can wash ankara and jeans with it.
Text_ortho: You fit use am wash ankara, wash jeans.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You can use it to wash ankara, wash jeans.

Text_en: You can wash any kind of clothing with my soap.
Text_ortho: Any type of cloth, you fit use my soap wash.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Any type of cloth, you can use my soap to wash it.

Text_en: And I make it in different colors.
Text_ortho: And I dey do different types of colour.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And I have a number of colours.

Text_en: I make it in lemon, pink, blue, and green, so that it will entice my customers.
Text_ortho: I dey do lemon colour, I dey do pink, I dey do blue, I dey do green so dat make e dey entice my customers.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I paint a lemon, I paint a pink, I paint a blue, I paint a green, so that it can enter into my customers.

Text_en: Or if they see it... ah, what color is this one?
Text_ortho: Or if de see am, ah which colour be dis one?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Or if they see it, ah, what color is this?

Text_en: Sometimes I even use orange.
Text_ortho: Even at times, I dey do orange colour.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And at times I was dressed in bright clothing.

Text_en: That's it!
Text_ortho: Na so o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's right!

Text_en: So soap making is a good business!
Text_ortho: So soap making, na correct business o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So soap making is a good business.

Text_en: Any woman who doesn't want her husband to mistreat her all around the house should find herself a bit of work... she should do something.
Text_ortho: Any woman wey e no want im husband make e dey take cloth dey knock im head for house, make e engage imsef for petty work, make e dey do o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Any woman who doesn't want her husband to take care of clothes, should engage herself in a mundane chore.

Text_en: It's not good to be idle.
Text_ortho: E no good make person dey idle.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's not good for someone to be idle.

Text_en: That's it!
Text_ortho: Na so o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's right!

Text_en: First of all, if I want to do like fifty liters, I will buy two liters of sulfuric acid.
Text_ortho: First of all, if I want do like fifty liters, I go buy sulphuric acid, two liters.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: First of all, if I want to make fifty liters, I will buy sulphuric acid, two liters.

Text_en: And the two liters go for one thousand, eight hundred naira.
Text_ortho: And dat two liters, at di rate of one thousand, eight hundred naira.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And that two liters, at the price of one thousand eight hundred naira.

Text_en: A liter is nine hundred.
Text_ortho: One liter is nine hundred.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: A person's weight na nine hundred.

Text_en: I will buy Texapon for six hundred naira.
Text_ortho: I go buy Tezapen six hundred naira.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'll buy Tezapen six hundred naira.

Text_en: When I have bought all those things, I will...
Text_ortho: If I buy all dose tings, I go...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If I buy all those things, I will...

Text_en: First of all, I will mix sulfuric acid with Texapon.
Text_ortho: First of all I go mix sulphuric acid wit Tezapen.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: First of all, I will mix sulphuric acid with Tezapen.

Text_en: I will stir the mixture very well, so that everything will dissolve.
Text_ortho: I go stir well, well make everyting melt.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will stir very well to make everything melt.

Text_en: Because sulfuric acid is a very strong acid.
Text_ortho: Because sulphuric acid, e dey hot well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because sulphuric acid, it gets heated up very well.

Text_en: So when I have stirred it very well, in order to dissolve it...
Text_ortho: So if I don stir am well, well make e melt, I go put my st-... caustic soda for water.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if I stir it very well to make it melt, I will put my st-... caustic soda in water.

Text_en: Because for fifty liters of soap, I will use ten spoons of caustic soda.
Text_ortho: Because for fifty liters of soap, I go use ten spoon of caustic soda.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: For fifty measures of soap will be needed, and ten measures of caustic soda will be needed for fifty measures.

Text_en: I will soak it in three liters of water.
Text_ortho: I go soak am for three liters of water.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will give it a third part of a hin of water.

Text_en: So when it has dissolved completely, I will pour it in.
Text_ortho: So if e don melt well, well, I go pour am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if it has melted very well, I will pour it in.

Text_en: When I have poured it in with, with the stuff I've mixed earlier (that sulfuric acid, and Texapon), I will pour the caustic soda into it.
