Text_ortho: If I pour am wit, wit di ones wey I don mix dat sulphuric acid, and Tezapen, I go pour dat caustic soda.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If I put it with... with those who have mixed that sulphuric acid, and Tezapen, I will pour in that caustic soda.

Text_en: I will stir it very well.
Text_ortho: I go stir am well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will stir it very well.

Text_en: In fact, as you are stirring it, you will notice smoke coming off of it because the mixture is really hot.
Text_ortho: Even as you dey stir am, you go dey see di smoke wey go dey come out cause di tin dey hot well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: While stirring it, you will see the smoke coming out because the thing gets heated up very well.

Text_en: So afterwards, I will also mix in my soda ash.
Text_ortho: So after dat one, I go still mix my soda ash.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So after that, I will mix my soda ash with it.

Text_en: I will pour it into three liters of water.
Text_ortho: I go put am for three liters of water.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And I will put it in three litres of water.

Text_en: I will mix that too.
Text_ortho: I go mix dat one too.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'll mix that too.

Text_en: When it has dissolved completely, I will pour it in.
Text_ortho: If e don disolve well, well, I go pour am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If it has resolved very well, I will pour it in.

Text_en: I'll stir it very well.
Text_ortho: I go stir am well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will stir it very well.

Text_en: After that sulfuric... after uh... the soda ash, I will add the STP-... STPP.
Text_ortho: After dat sulphuric, after em soda ash, I go put STP-... STPP.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: After that sulphuric... after uh... soda ash, I will put STP-... STPP.

Text_en: I will put that into three liters of water because I don't like my soap to be watery.
Text_ortho: I go put dat one for three liters of water because I no dey like make my soap dey watery.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will put a third part of a hin of water on it because I don’t like my soap to be in the water.

Text_en: So when I've done all that... all those things, then I'll add three liters of water at intervals till it gets to the uh... perfume.
Text_ortho: So if I don do am like dat, all dose tings, na so I go dey put am three, three liters of water till e go reach eh perfume.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if I do it like that, all those things... that's how I will use three or three liters of water to reach uh... perfume.

Text_en: When I've mixed everything in that order, if the water doesn't get to the measurement I wanted, I can add more water to it because if the soap is really thick, people will buy it.
Text_ortho: If I don mix everyting like dat, if water no come reach di amount wey I wan make e reach, I fit add am water because if soap tick well, well, people go buy am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If I have mixed everything like that, if water doesn’t get to the amount I want it to, I can add it to it because if soap is too thick, people will buy it.

Text_en: If it's too watery, it won't lather very well.
Text_ortho: If e too watery, e no go dey foam well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If it's too watery, it won't be very foamy.

Text_en: So that's how I do mine.
Text_ortho: So na so I dey do my own.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And that's how I do my business.

Text_en: And I thank God for my life because I am not a liability to my husband.
Text_ortho: And I dey tank God for my life because I no be liability for my husband.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And I tank God for my life because I am not a liability to my husband.

Text_en: People are buying it!
Text_ortho: People dey buy o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: People are buying!

Text_en: Even this sister of mine, she uses my soap to wash clothes.
Text_ortho: Even dis my sista, na my soap im dey use wash cloth.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I even use soap to wash cloth.

Text_en: All the people in my compound buy soap from me.
Text_ortho: All of my compound people dem dey buy soap for my hand.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All my compounders bought me soap in my hand.

Text_en: They are buying it.
Text_ortho: Dem dey buy am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They buy it.

Text_en: Even the people on the street, they buy it because they know that my soap okay.
Text_ortho: People for street sef, dem dey buy cause de know sey my soap dey okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: People on the street, they buy it because they know that my soap is okay.

Text_en: I can bring out one for you to smell.
Text_ortho: I fit carry one make you perceive di odour.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I can use one to make you understand the other person.

Text_en: The thing is really great.
Text_ortho: Di ting dey okay well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The thing is okay.

Text_en: You can use it to wash plates; you can use it to wash clothes, you can use it to wash your toilet, mop your kitchen.
Text_ortho: You fit use am wash plate, you fit use am wash cloth, you fit use am wash your toilet, mop your kitchen.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You can use it to wash the dishes, you can use it to wash cloth, you can use it to wash your toilet, mop your kitchen.

Text_en: Anywhere, anywhere; you can use it for anything, anything.
Text_ortho: Anywhere, anywhere, anyting, anyting, you fit use am do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Anywhere, anywhere, anything, anything, anything you can use it for.

Text_en: Nothing wrong with it.
Text_ortho: Nothing do am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Nothing did it.

Text_en: No problems at all.
Text_ortho: No shaking.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: No shaking.

Text_en: So, I am alright.
Text_ortho: So I dey kampe.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So I was in tentpe.

Text_en: Okay.
Text_ortho: Okay.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Okay.

Text_en: Good, it's good.
Text_ortho: Toh na well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Well, it's well.

Text_en: Let me talk as a m-... about my life as a mother now as uh... motherhood.
Text_ortho: Make I talk as m-... about my life as moder now, as eh motherhood now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Let me talk as m-... about my life as a mother, as uh... mother.

Text_en: I just gave birth uh... like seven months ago.
Text_ortho: I just born now eh like seven months.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I just gave birth to uh... seven months now.

Text_en: Kai, when I was pregnant, it was not easy at all.
Text_ortho: Kai when I dey pregnant, e no dey easy o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Kai, when I got pregnant, it wasn't easy.

Text_en: Pregnant woman go through some tough times, man!
Text_ortho: Pregnant woman dey hear am chai!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Chai! A Pregnant woman!

Text_en: If I don't throw up today, if I don't get dizzy...
Text_ortho: If I no vomit today, if my eyes no dey turn me...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If I don't vomit today, if my eyes don't make me...

Text_en: Mtschew, it was not easy at all, at all, man!
Text_ortho: Mtschew e no dey easy at all, at all kai!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Mtschew, it's not easy at all, at all!

Text_en: At that time uh... ah that was how, any...
Text_ortho: Dat time eh, ah na so any...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That time uh... ah, that's when any...

Text_en: I couldn't do anything.
Text_ortho: I no fit do anytin.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I can't do anything.

Text_en: My husband felt really bad for me.
Text_ortho: My husband just dey pity me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My husband was just pity me.

Text_en: He was the one helping me out with some things.
Text_ortho: Na im dey help me do some tings.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He's the one who helps me do some things.

Text_en: Man, all our mothers work really hard.
Text_ortho: Kai our mama dem, de dey try o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Our mothers, they are doing their best.

Text_en: They are really working hard.
Text_ortho: De dey try well, well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They are doing a lot.

Text_en: But ever since I gave birth... immediately after I gave birth, look at me feeling so great.
Text_ortho: But as I con born now, immediately I born, see as I con well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But as soon as I gave birth, straight away I gave birth, look at how I felt.

Text_en: Everything's f-... uh, it's like I was never pregnant.
Text_ortho: Everytin f-... eh con be like sey I no dey pregnant before.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Every f-... uh... it's like I'm not pregnant.

Text_en: Everything's great now.
Text_ortho: Everyting con dey a'ah.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Everything was a'ah.

Text_en: All the headache, everything, everything, all the sickness just stopped, okay?
Text_ortho: All di headache, everyting, everyting, every sickness just stop kpai!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All the headaches, everything, everything, every sickness just stopped.

Text_en: I said, "uh, is this how it is?"
Text_ortho: I say ehn na so e be?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said, "eh, that's how it is?"

Text_en: So now that we had the kid, the drama started.
Text_ortho: So we con born di pikin now, drama con start.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So we gave birth to the child and drama started.

Text_en: Yes now, okay you had a kid.
Text_ortho: Yes now, okay you born baby.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Yes, okay, you gave birth to a baby.

Text_en: The baby, as I f-... gave birth to her, for f- two days, I did not see the baby.
Text_ortho: Baby, as I f-... born am sef, for f-... two days, I no see di baby.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Mama, as I f-... gave birth to her, for f-... two days, I didn't see the baby.

Text_en: Because it came early.
Text_ortho: Because na pretime.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because it's pre-time.

Text_en: The baby came earlier than expected.
Text_ortho: Di baby no reach time wey I take born am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The baby was not even close to the time I gave birth to her.

Text_en: So they kept her for... almost a week.
Text_ortho: So de keep am for like one week.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So they kept it up for like a week.

Text_en: When I finally saw the baby, see, the tiny thing looked small.
Text_ortho: As I con see di baby now, see di tiny ting con small.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: As I saw the baby, look at the little thing.

Text_en: Then I started breastfeeding.
Text_ortho: Con start to breastfeed.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then he started giving breastfeed.

Text_en: Ah, waking up in the night is another job.
Text_ortho: Ah to dey wake up for night, anoder work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ah! Get up at night, and another work.

Text_en: Another big job indeed.
Text_ortho: Anoder big work o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Another big work!

Text_en: I was just waking at night, man.
Text_ortho: I just dey wake up for night kai.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was just awake at night.

Text_en: Sometimes... my mother was alive at the time, she would help me carry her a little.
Text_ortho: Sometimes (my mama dey dat time) she go help me carry small.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Sometimes, my mother was there at that time, she would help me carry a few pounds.

Text_en: My husband would also carry her a while, until, until...
Text_ortho: My husband too go carry small sotay, sotay...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My husband will also take a little sotay, sotay...

Text_en: Because I was only feeding her with breastmilk.
Text_ortho: Because na only breastmilk I dey give am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because I give her breast milk.

Text_en: I didn't give her any...
Text_ortho: I no give am any...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I didn't give him any...

Text_en: I didn't give her any baby formula.
Text_ortho: I no give am formula.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don’t give it a formal form.

Text_en: So little by little, by the third month, she was waking up less at night.
Text_ortho: So small, small, as three months reach, di time wey she take dey wake up for night con reduce.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So a little... about three months, the time she was awake at night came to a stop.

Text_en: I was still...
Text_ortho: I con still dey...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was still...

Text_en: I was still just giving her food, breastmilk.
Text_ortho: I still dey give am only food, breastmilk.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I still gave her breast milk.

Text_en: I wasn't giving her any formula.
Text_ortho: I no give am formula.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don’t give it a formal form.

Text_en: When she was six months old, ehen.
Text_ortho: E con reach six months ehen.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It was six months, uhuh.

Text_en: When we got to the sixth month, she stopped taking breastmilk.
Text_ortho: When we reach six months, na she no even collect breastmilk again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When we were six months old, she didn't even take breast milk again.

Text_en: One day, I tested her by giving her baby food.
Text_ortho: One day, I con try am give am pap.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: One day, I tried to give him a pap.

Text_en: She took it.
Text_ortho: E collect am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He took it.

Text_en: I said ah.
Text_ortho: I say ah.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I say, ah.

Text_en: Okay!
Text_ortho: Okay!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Okay!

Text_en: So after some time, she started taking breastmilk again.
Text_ortho: So after some time, she con start to collect breastmilk again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So after a while, she started to collect breast milk again.

Text_en: So she was eating, sleeping and everything.
Text_ortho: So she dey chop, dey sleep, everyting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So she ate, she slept, everything.

Text_en: That was how we went on, going bit by bit.
Text_ortho: Na so we con dey do am, dey rough am small, small.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how we started doing it, roughing it up a bit.

Text_en: But even up until now, she still wakes up in the middle of the night, she still wakes up.
Text_ortho: But even till now sha, she still dey wake up for middle of di night o, still dey wake up.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But even up to now, she is still awake in the middle of the night, still awakening.

Text_en: But her hair has grown.
Text_ortho: But her hair don grow now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But her hair has grown up now.

Text_en: She's a girl.
Text_ortho: Na girl.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's girl.

Text_en: So I have started plaiting her hair little by little, little by little, and I'm buying clothes.
Text_ortho: So I don dey plait im hair small, small, small, small, dey buy cloth.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So I have started plaiting his hair and buying clothes for him.

Text_en: We take pictures.
Text_ortho: We dey take photo.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We were taking pictures.

Text_en: The girl, she likes to play with phones.
Text_ortho: Di girl, she like to play with phone o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The girl... she like playing with a phone.

Text_en: Phones, laptops, television, all those things attract her.
Text_ortho: Phone, laptop, telly, all dose tins dey attract am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Using phones and laptops, telling him that all those things are intrusions into him.

Text_en: I don't know if she wants to do... if she wants to go into the entertainment industry or something.
Text_ortho: I no know wheder she wan do, wheder na entertainment she wan do now, or wetin.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don’t know if it's entertainment she wants to do, or what she wants to do.

Text_en: I don't know.
Text_ortho: I no know.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I don't know.

Text_en: We never know, but...
Text_ortho: We never know but...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We haven't known but...

Text_en: Well, she has not started talking, but we play, we laugh.
Text_ortho: She never even start to talk sha, but we dey play, we dey laugh.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She hasn't even started talking, but we are playing and laughing.

Text_en: We are just...
Text_ortho: We just dey...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We were just...

Text_en: We are just fine.
Text_ortho: We just dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We're just...

Text_en: We are just fine, enjoying.
Text_ortho: We just dey like dat, dey enjoy.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We just like that, are enjoying it.

Text_en: After my mom stayed with me for one month, she left.
Text_ortho: As my mama stay with me one month, she don go.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: As my mother was staying with me a month, she had gone.

Text_en: Me and my husband started doing it little by little, little by little, together.
Text_ortho: Na me, and my husband con dey do am small, small, small, small together.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then my husband and I started doing it together.

Text_en: In fact, I've started working now.
Text_ortho: I don even start work now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I even started working now.

Text_en: So I have started taking her to daycare.
Text_ortho: So I don even dey carry am go creche.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So I even took her to creche.

Text_en: So at least, sometimes, me too... I'll say I am going on, on break.
Text_ortho: So at least, sometimes, me too, I go say I dey go on, on break.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So at least, sometimes, myself, I will say I am going on my break.

Text_en: When she goes to daycare, I'll be able to work.
Text_ortho: When she go creche, I go fit work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When she went to creche, I could work.

Text_en: I come back to the house in the afternoon.
Text_ortho: I go come back for house for afternoon.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will come back to the house in the morning.

Text_en: In the evening, we continue as usual.
Text_ortho: Evening time, we go continue wetin we just dey do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: During the day, we will continue doing what we're doing.

Text_en: Me, I work for the local government.
Text_ortho: Me, I dey work for local government.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Me, I work in the Local Government.

Text_en: I'm a civil servant.
Text_ortho: I be government worker.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm a government worker.

Text_en: Uh... so there in the local government, if I...
Text_ortho: Ehn so for local government dere sha, if I go...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Eh, so, in the local government, if I go...

Text_en: But the good thing is that since I gave birth, the government has a procedure.
Text_ortho: But di good ting be sey as I born pikin, e get as government take do am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But the good news is that as I was born a child, the government did it.

Text_en: I gave birth, I got uh...
Text_ortho: I born pikin, I get eh...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I gave birth to a child, I have uh...

Text_en: I was on maternity leave for three months.
Text_ortho: I dey maternity leave for three months.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was on thematernity leave for three months.

Text_en: I was away for three months.
Text_ortho: I go three months.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will be three months old.

Text_en: When I came back, three months... for those three months now, immediately I resumed, if others finish by four o' clock, they let me finish by two o' clock.
Text_ortho: When I come back three months, for dat three months now, as I resume work, if oder people dey close for four o'clock, de gree make I dey close two o'clock.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When I come back in three months, for that three months now, as I resume work, if others are closing at four o clock, they will allow me to close at two o clock.

Text_en: So I finish on time, go get my child, and head home.
Text_ortho: So I go close on time, go carry pikin go house.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So I will come to an end and take a child to my house.

Text_en: So this arrangement of two o' clock will go f-... will go on for six months.
Text_ortho: So dis two o'clock one go go f-... go run for six months.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So this two o clock one will go f-... will run for six months.

Text_en: After six months, I will start working again.
Text_ortho: After six months, I go con start work again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: After six months, I'll start working again.

Text_en: So that government procedure is good.
Text_ortho: So e good as government do am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So it's good the government did it.

Text_en: My child will be almost a year old before I start working fully.
Text_ortho: My pikin go don almost reach one year before I go con dey do work fully.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My daughter would be almost a year old before I started working full.

Text_en: So she will be very strong, like that.
Text_ortho: So she go don dey strong well, well like dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So she will be very strong.

Text_en: Even those three months they gave us...
Text_ortho: Even dat three months wey dey give us...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: For even those three months which are giving us...

Text_en: But we're still praying that they extend this uh... leave as uh... the doctors... the hospitals say we should breastfeed exclusively for six months.
Text_ortho: But we still dey pray make de extend dis eh leave as eh doctor, hospital say meh we dey do exclusive breastfeeding for six months.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But we still pray that they should extend this uh... leave as uh... doctor... hospital, we should be doing exclusive breastfeeding for six months.

Text_en: So if they can extend this uh... leave to a period of six months, it will be better because even that time... well, God has helped me.
Text_ortho: So if de fit make dis eh leave meh e dey enter six months, for dey good because even dat time, God con help me sha.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So if they can allow this uh... leave it for six months, for it's good because at that time, God helped me.

Text_en: There's a daycare next to my office.
Text_ortho: E get creche beside my office.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: There's a creed near my office.

Text_en: I take my kids there.
Text_ortho: I carry my pikin go.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I took my child with me.

Text_en: So while I'm here at work, I'll go feed her, go fin-... so that I will be able to do this uh, six months ehn.. six months full t-... uh mtschew, exclusively like they recommend.
Text_ortho: So as I dey work, I go go feed am, go fin-... so dat I go fit do dis eh six months, ehn six months full t-... eh mtschew exclusive wey de talk.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So as I'm working, I go and feed it, go fin-... so that I can do this uh... six months, uh... six months full of t-... uh... mtschew exclusive that they're talking about.

Text_en: But some people won't be able to do it.
Text_ortho: But e get some people now, de no go fit do am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But some people... they won't be able to do it.

Text_en: They won't be able to do it, due to their work.
Text_ortho: De no go fit do am because of deir work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They will not be able to do it because of their work.

Text_en: It... those who work with private organisations, are the ones I pity the most.
Text_ortho: E, people wey even dey private, na im I pity pass.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I have more compassion for people who are even private.

Text_en: But ev-...
Text_ortho: But ev-...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But ev-...

Text_en: Some people... even some government workers, cannot do it if there's no daycare in the office.
Text_ortho: Some people (even some government people) no fit do am if creche no dey your office.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Some people (even some government people) can't do it if there's no creed in your office.

Text_en: My saving grace is the fact that there's a daycare in my office.
Text_ortho: Wetin help me be sey creche dey my office.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: What helped me was that a creche was in my office.

Text_en: If I hadn't had a daycare in my office, it wouldn't have been easy.
Text_ortho: Creche no dey my office now, e for no dey easy.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Crche isn't in my office right now, it wouldn't be easy.

Text_en: But that's what helped me, really, so I've been able to do it.
Text_ortho: But na wetin help me sha, so, I con fit do am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But, well, that's what helped me, so I could do it.

Text_en: The child has grown now.
Text_ortho: Di pikin don grow now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The child is growing up now.

Text_en: Now, she eats.
Text_ortho: She don dey chop now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She's eating now.

Text_en: So everything is alright.
Text_ortho: So everyting don balance.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So everything has a balance.

Text_en: Ehn... now in the office, as I am, it is...
Text_ortho: Ehn for office now, as I dey so, e be...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehn, in the office, as I am here, it's...

Text_en: What I do is kind of like documentation work.
Text_ortho: Wetin I dey do be like documentation work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I do it mostly for legal work.

Text_en: Ehn.
Text_ortho: Ehn.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehn.

Text_en: When the ones who go out on assignment come back, I will ev...
Text_ortho: People wey go out on assignment, come back, I go ev...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: People who go out on assignment come back, I will uh...

Text_en: Or maybe... let's say I'm in charge of the staff, ehen what the staff does... people who go for training, who come back.
Text_ortho: Or maybe make I talk sey I dey in charge of staff, ehen wetin staff dey do, people wey dey go training, wey dey come back.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Or maybe I should mention that I'm in charge of staff... uhuh... what staff does... people who attend training... who come back from training.

Text_en: It's administrative work.
Text_ortho: Na admin work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's administrative work.

Text_en: I colllect documents.
Text_ortho: I dey collect document.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was collecting documents.

Text_en: People are...
Text_ortho: People dey...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: People are...

Text_en: Ah when they write application letters, they forward them to me before I take them to my boss who will then pass them to...
Text_ortho: Ah when de write application, forward for my side before me I go con carry am go give our oga wey go con pass am to...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ah, when they sat for me, I would carry them to our boss who would pass them to...

Text_en: Everything.
Text_ortho: Everyting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Everything.

Text_en: Even if people want to see...
Text_ortho: Even if people wan see...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even if people want to see...

Text_en: If people want to do... maybe... like collaboration (sometimes, all these NYSC [National Youth Service Corps] students, they come, wanting to do some work for our Local Government now), they will write their application letters.
Text_ortho: If people wan do maybe like collaboration (sometimes all dis NYSC students, de dey con wan do some work for our local government now), de go write deir application.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If people want to do maybe like a collaboration ( sometimes, all these NYSC students, they want to do some work in our local government), they will write their application.

Text_en: I will be the one to process it.
Text_ortho: Na me go process am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'll process it for myself.

Text_en: I will be the one to forward it... to go and give it to my boss.
Text_ortho: Na me go forward am, go give oga.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I would be the one to go forward and give it to the king.

Text_en: Then the boss will check it before...
Text_ortho: Oga go con check am before...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The Lord will come and check it before...

Text_en: Even when the boss wants to reply, I will still be the one to still...
Text_ortho: Even when oga wan reply now, na me still go, still...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even when the boss wants to reply, it's me who will... still...

Text_en: He will still channel the thing through me, then I will give the person the reply.
Text_ortho: E go still channel di tin pass my side wey I go con give di person di reply.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He will still channel the thing through my side, so I will give the person the answer.

Text_en: Whether he gets a favourable letter or whether the thing... the deal will not work out, I'll still be the one to pass... to tell them.
Text_ortho: Wheder e get di favourable letter, or wheder di tin, di deal no go work, na me go still pass tell dem.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Whether the letter has a favorable letter or if the deal fails, I would still be the one to tell them.

Text_en: Even during promotion exercises and all these things, I am still the one who hands over the letters to the staff members.
Text_ortho: Even when dey do promotion, and all dis tins, na me still dey carry letter give staff.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even when they do the promoted campaign and all these things, I'm the one who gives the letters to the staff.

Text_en: This is what they've done.
Text_ortho: Sey dis na wetin dey don do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Saying, This is what he has done.

Text_en: I started working at uh... the University of Ibadan here.
Text_ortho: I start working at eh University of Ibadan here.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I started working for uh... the University of Ibadan here.

Text_en: I'm an electrician, which they call onise ina.
Text_ortho: I dey do electrician which de dey call onise ina.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I work in Electrical Engineering, which they call onise ina.

Text_en: I'm working there.
Text_ortho: Na dere I dey work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was working there.

Text_en: I've served...
Text_ortho: I don serve...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I have served...

Text_en: I almost uh...
Text_ortho: I almost eh...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I almost eh...

Text_en: At least, I'm up to uh... thirty five, or thirty four years in service now.
Text_ortho: At least, e don reach eh thirty five, or thirty four years in service now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: At least, it's about thirty five or thirty four years now.

Text_en: The work I'm doing, I like it even though it's a dangerous job, it's the li-... work.
Text_ortho: Di work wey I dey do, I like am even though na dangerous work na im be di li-... work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The work I'm doing, I like it, even though it's a dangerous job, that's the li-... work.

Text_en: But I still like it because I'm good at it.
Text_ortho: But I still like am cause I don perfect on it.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But I still love him because I have made progress in it.

Text_en: So I've been doing the work very well.
Text_ortho: Wey I dey do di work very well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That I am doing this work very well.

Text_en: No problem.
Text_ortho: No problem.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: No problem.

Text_en: Uh... everything we're doing here (we lay cables, we do wiring, we wire homes), when the university gets electricity, we're the ones who do it.
Text_ortho: Ehn everyting wey we dey do here (we dey lay cable, we dey do wiring, we dey do housing wiring) before light come to di university, na we go do am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Uh... everything we're doing here (we're laying copper, we're getting electricity, we're getting housing,...) before electricity comes to the university, we'll do it.

Text_en: We do m-... we mount uh... tre-... transformer, we mount RI-... RMU.
Text_ortho: We do m-... we dey mount eh tre-... transformer, we dey mount RI-... RMU.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We do m-... we are on uh... tre-... transformers, we are on Mount RI-... RMU.

Text_en: Lots, lots of things, that's what we are uh... using.
Text_ortho: Many, many things, na im we dey ehn use.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We use uh... many, many things.

Text_en: We lay cables, but when we want to lay cables (that big one, the cable, if you carry it, it's a big one), we will lay it in a gutter which they dig for us.
Text_ortho: We lay cable, but when we want lay cable (dat big one, cable, if you carry am, na big one), we go lay am for inside gutter wey dem go dig for us.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We lay a cable, but when we want to lay a cable (big one, big one, if you carry it up big, big one), we will lay it in the gutters we will dig up for us.

Text_en: After that, we will install lights.
Text_ortho: After we do dat one, we go put light dere.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: After we've done that, we'll put in the lights.

Text_en: The lights make everyone cheer.
Text_ortho: Light go come make yah for everybody.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Light will come to an end for everyone.

Text_en: Because they know we've finished.
Text_ortho: Den go know sey we don do am finish.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then they will know that we have finished doing it.

Text_en: But it's dangerous work for a novice!
Text_ortho: But na danger work o, if person no know.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But it's a danger, if you don't know.

Text_en: But a person who's sure he's mastered it, he'll concentrate on what he's doing.
Text_ortho: But person wey e go don sabi sey e don sabi am, e go concentrate for di ting wey e dey do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But a person who knows that he has become familiar with him, he will focus on what he is doing.

Text_en: By then, even though the university doesn't pay us that much for the work we're doing, we know that we're still working.
Text_ortho: By dis time, even though university did not compensate us for di work wey we dey do too much but we still know sey we still dey work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: By this time, though the universities did not compensate us for our work, we still knew that we were still working.

Text_en: We're still doing it.
Text_ortho: We dey still work am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We still work on it.

Text_en: And uh... there are a lot of people with us here.
Text_ortho: And eh many people wey dey with us here.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And uh... many people with us here.

Text_en: We have uh... cable dressing, cable jointer section, we have overhead, we have uh... streetlights, we have the people doing wiring for houses.
Text_ortho: We have eh cable dressing, cable jointer section, we have overhead, we have eh streetlights, we have dose who dey wiring for house.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We have uh... a cord dressing... a joint joint, we have an overhead... we have uh... street lights, we have some electricians in the house.

Text_en: But ours is cable jointers.
Text_ortho: But our own na cable jointer.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Our own is a rope jointer.

Text_en: We are the ones who bring RMU, we are the ones who mount uh... transformers in the university.
Text_ortho: Na we dey bring RMU, na we dey mount eh transformer for university.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We bring in RMU [RMU], we mount uh... transformers in the university.

Text_en: Every high, high tension that we do, it's our section that's doing it.
Text_ortho: Every high, high tension wey we dey do, na our section na im dey do am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Every high and high tension we are having in our area, that's where we are doing it.

Text_en: We're the ones doing everything.
Text_ortho: Na we dey do everytin.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We do all things.

Text_en: Apart from that, we can do house wiring.
Text_ortho: Apart from dat, we can do wiring house.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Apart from that, we can work on a house for electricity.

Text_en: But in our own section here, it's only the laying of cables, connection of transformers, connection of uh... RMU.
Text_ortho: But for our own section here, it's only laying cable, connect transformer, connect eh RMU.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But in our own section here, it's just laying a wire, connecting the transformer, connecting uh... RMU.

Text_en: That’s all we're doing in our own section here.
Text_ortho: Na only dat one we dey do for our own here.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's the only thing we do here on our own.

Text_en: In this section, at least, we have three sections... two... or two.
Text_ortho: For dis section, at least, we get three section, two, or two.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: In this section, at least, we have three sections, two or two.

Text_en: Uh... there is rewinding.
Text_ortho: En rewinding, e dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's rewinding, it's in front.

Text_en: Oh uh...
Text_ortho: Oh ehn...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Oh uh...

Text_en: We should...
Text_ortho: Mey...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Meh...

Text_en: We have ones who are re-... repairing transformers, we ones who connect transformers.
Text_ortho: Dose who dey re-... repair transformer, e dey, dose who dey connect transformer, e dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The Dose who re-... repair the transformer, there's... those who connect the transformer, there's them.

Text_en: But in our section here, I am the station head, I am the overall boss in this section, who runs this place.
Text_ortho: But for our section here, I be stational head, I be di oga patapata for dis section wey dey do dis place.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But in our section here, I'm the stational head, I'm the boss in this section of this place.

Text_en: We're the ones who mount all these places.
Text_ortho: Na we dey mount all dis place.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All these places are for our heritage.

Text_en: We have...
Text_ortho: We get...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We have...

Text_en: If an... if they bring a form saying that there... it... see, there is a pro-... problem there, he will bring the form, we will fill it out, we will pass it on to our overall boss who will go and do the wor-... send us to s-... to go out, to uh... go and do the work.
Text_ortho: If an, if de bring form say de, e see dere is a pro-... problem dere, e go bring di form, we go fill am, we go pass am to our oga patapata for up wey e go go do di wor-... send us to s-... to go out, to eh go and do di work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If an... if they bring in form that they... he sees there is a pro-... problem there, he will bring the form, we will fill it up, we will send it to our boss to s-... send us to s-... to go out, to uh... go and do the work.

Text_en: That's how we do it here.
Text_ortho: Na so we dey do here.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how we do this here.

Text_en: For any other problem that comes up, first of all you'll fill out papers stating that there's a problem in this section, they want them... these people to come and do the repairs, before we can go.
Text_ortho: Any oda problem wey e dey, you will first of all fill paper say problem dey o for dis section o, de want dem, dis people to come, and do di repair, before we can go.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Any other problem that's going on, you will first of all fill a paper and say there's a problem in this section, they want these people to come and do the repair before we can go.

Text_en: It's because the boss has given instructions that we should not pass... go beyond his... our boundaries.
Text_ortho: It's because oga don put instruction down say we should not pass, go beyond im, our boundary.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's because the boss has instructed us to not pass, pass over his... our boundary.

Text_en: We're the ones doing all these things.
Text_ortho: All dis tin, na we dey do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: All this is our business.

Text_en: Uh... those who are under me, we're at least... we are... we're up to ten, or fifteen.
Text_ortho: Eh dose who dey for under me, we 're at least, we are, we up to ten, or to fifteen.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Eh those who are under me, we are at least, we are... we are up to ten or fifteen.

Text_en: We have uh... ones who do nights, afternoons, and mornings.
Text_ortho: We have eh dose who dey do nights, afternoon, morning.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We have uh... those who do night, afternoon, and morning.

Text_en: That is how we do... divided them up to do the work.
Text_ortho: That is how we do, divided dem sey make de dey do work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how we did... divided them to do their work.

Text_en: Those s-... the people who are on night shift now, they were here early in the morning.
Text_ortho: Dose s-... di people wey dey night now, de dey here early morning.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Dose s-... the people who are staying here at night now, are early in the morning.

Text_en: They're here with us.
Text_ortho: De dey with us here.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They're with us here.

Text_en: Some people, they are regular.
Text_ortho: Some people, we dey do regular.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Some people, we do regular sessions.

Text_en: Regular, is what this...
Text_ortho: Regular, na im dis...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The regular... that's what this...

Text_en: That's how we do it here.
Text_ortho: Everyday!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Everyday!

Text_en: We come everyday.
Text_ortho: We dey come everyday.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We're coming everyday.

Text_en: No shifting for that group of people.
Text_ortho: No shifting for dat people.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: No change for those people.

Text_en: The ones on morning shift, they'll come in the morning.
Text_ortho: Dose who dey do morning, de go come in di morning.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The Dose who does the morning will come in the morning.

Text_en: When it's two o'clock, they'll leave work.
Text_ortho: When it is two o'clock, de leave di work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When it's two o clock, they leave the work.

Text_en: They go back to their place to s-... sleep.
Text_ortho: De go back to their place wey dem dey s-... sleep.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They will go back to their place where they s-... sleep.

Text_en: But the ones on the afternoon shift will come back by two.
Text_ortho: But dose who dey afternoon go come back by two.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But those who are in the afternoon will come back by two.

Text_en: They will close by nine.
Text_ortho: De will close by nine.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They will close by nine.

Text_en: After nine, the ones who do... are on the night shift, they will take over for them from... to, to the other day, the second day... morning, because before the morning, people will come to take over for them.
Text_ortho: After nine, dose who do, dey for night, de will take over from dem from, to, to di oda day, di second day, morning because before di morning people come take over from dem.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: After nine... those who do... are at night, they will take them away from them from, to, to the second day, because before the morning, they will take them away.

Text_en: That is how we do our work here.
Text_ortho: Dat is how we dey work our work here.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how we work here.

Text_en: No.
Text_ortho: No.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Nov.

Text_en: We don’t collect money!
Text_ortho: We no dey collect money o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We don't collect money.

Text_en: We only collect our salary here which yeah, the Federal Government gives us.
Text_ortho: Na only salary we dey collect here wey yeah di Federal Government dey give us.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We only pay taxes here which the Federal Government gives us.

Text_en: If we go to work in a house, for instance in your house, we will not collect payment from you.
Text_ortho: If we go work for house sef, for your house now, we no go collect kobo for you.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If we'll work in your house, in your house, we won't collect any money for you.

Text_en: Because it is our pol-... nai-... du-... call... duty to do the work for you.
Text_ortho: Because it is our pol-... nai-... du-... call, duty to do di work for you.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because it's our pol-... it's i-... du-... call, duty to do the work for you.

Text_en: He doesn’t collect money, he doesn’t collect money.
Text_ortho: E no dey collect money, e no dey collect ego.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He doesn't collect money, he doesn't collect ego.

Text_en: The only thing we collect... we say if you say we... uh... the work which we did for you, that, it, it pleases you, you will say, "here, go and buy some soft drinks", if for instance you gave ten naira, we will take it uh... happily, collect it from you and pray for God to bless you and make you very wealthy.
Text_ortho: Only what we collect, we say if you say we, eh di work wey we do for you sey, e, e please you, you go say take, go buy minerals, if to say na ten naira you bring, we go take eh happily, collect am from you, pray for you sey God go bless you o, e go increase your your wealth very, very well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Only what we collect, we say, "we, uh... the work we did for you, uh... you will say you should take... go buy minerals, if you want to say it's ten naira, we will take uh... happily, collect it from you, pray for you that God will bless you, he will increase your wealth very well."

Text_en: That is how we do it here.
Text_ortho: Na so we dey do here.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how we do this here.

Text_en: We don’t collect money.
Text_ortho: We no dey collect money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We don't collect money.

Text_en: Anybody who comes here, we do our own services for them.
Text_ortho: Anybody wey come here, we do our own service for am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And if any man comes to us, we will do his work for him.

Text_en: Thank God for today!
Text_ortho: We tank God for today o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We thank God today.

Text_en: My name is Titi Ade.
Text_ortho: My name na Titi Ade.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My name is Titi Ade.

Text_en: I uh... I married...
Text_ortho: I ehn I marry...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I uh... I married...

Text_en: Some years ago, I married a soldier.
Text_ortho: Some years ago, I marry to soldier man.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I was married to a man from a military background.

Text_en: I live in the barracks.
Text_ortho: I'm living in di barracks.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm living in the barracks.

Text_en: We lived in the northern part of Nigeria before.
Text_ortho: We don live for northern part of Nigeria before.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We have lived in the northern part of Nigeria.

Text_en: We lived in Jos, we lived in Bauchi.
Text_ortho: We live for Jos, we live for Bauchi.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We live in Jos, we live in Bauchi.

Text_en: From Bauchi to Jos, from Jos to Lagos.
Text_ortho: From Bauchi to Jos, from Jos to Lagos.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: From Bauchi to Jos, from Jos to Lagos.

Text_en: As we left Lagos, we came to Ibadan.
Text_ortho: As we leave dem Lagos, we come Ibadan.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: As we left Lagos, we came to Ibadan.

Text_en: I am...
Text_ortho: I dey...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I am...

Text_en: My church which I'm going to is Mountain of Fire and Miracle Ministry, South West Two, Ojoo.
Text_ortho: My church wey I dey go na Mountain of Fire and Miracle Ministry, South West two, Ojo.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: My church I go to is Mountain of Fire and Miracle Ministry, and South West two, Ojo.

Text_en: Everything happening in Nigeria, everything is in God's hands.
Text_ortho: Everyting wey dey happen for Nigeria, everyting dey God hand o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Everything happening in Nigeria, everything is in God's hands.

Text_en: Let's just leave everything to God.
Text_ortho: Make we just leave everyting for God.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Let's leave everything for God.

Text_en: Because like our soldiers, they have killed a lot of them.
Text_ortho: Because like our soldiers, de don kill many of dem.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because like our soldiers, they have killed many of them.

Text_en: Many of the women... many women in the barracks now, they are widows.
Text_ortho: Many of di women, many women in di barracks now, de are widows.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Many of the women... many women in the barracks, are widows.

Text_en: They don’t have of... husbands.
Text_ortho: De don't have of, husbands.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They don't have of... husbands.

Text_en: Some of them, they are very young, some with one child, some with two children, and so on like that.
Text_ortho: Some of dem, de are very young, some wit one child, some with two children, and so on like dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Some of them are very young, some with one child, some with two children, and so on.

Text_en: And we are still praying.
Text_ortho: And we still dey for prayer.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And we are still in prayer.

Text_en: May God just help us with the problem of Boko Haram which is killing our soldiers, and some innocent uh... people.
Text_ortho: Make God just help us for di problem of di Boko Haram wey dey kill our soldiers, and some innocent eh people.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Let God help us in the problem of the Boko Haram, who kills our soldiers, and some innocent uh... people.

Text_en: We are still praying.
Text_ortho: Na di prayer we still dey o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We're still praying.

Text_en: May God just help us.
Text_ortho: Meh God just help us.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: God should just help us.

Text_en: The Boko Haram problem is here.
Text_ortho: Di Boko Haram problem dey dere.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The Boko Haram problem was there.

Text_en: We are... we...
Text_ortho: We dey we...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We are the ones...

Text_en: Before that... uh... before the food shortages came again; children... there's no money to go to school.
Text_ortho: Before dat, ehn before di scarcity of food con join again, children, no money to go school.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Before that... uh... before the scarcity of food started again, children, there was no money to go to school.

Text_en: No school fees, no food.
Text_ortho: No school fees, no food.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: There's no school fees, no food.

Text_en: We're just managing things.
Text_ortho: We just dey manage life.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We're just managing our lives.

Text_en: The things we bought last week, if you want to buy them today, you will buy it...
Text_ortho: Di ting wey we buy last week, if you wan buy am today, you go buy am...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The thing we bought last week, if you want to buy it today, you will buy it...

Text_en: We, we, we...
Text_ortho: We, we, we...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We, we, we...

Text_en: If you bought it last week for two hundred naira, like today, if you want to buy it, they will say it is five hundred.
Text_ortho: If you buy am last week two hundred naira, like today, if you wan buy, dem go say na five hundred.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If you buy it last week for two hundred naira, like today, if you want to buy it, they will say it's five hundred.

Text_en: What are we in for?
Text_ortho: Which one we dey inside?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Which one are we in?

Text_en: So it's only God, he's the one who will help us.
Text_ortho: So na only God na im go just help us.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, it's God who will just help us.

Text_en: Let's keep praying, and let's pray for our president.
Text_ortho: Make we continue to dey pray, and make we pray for our president.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We should continue praying, and pray for our President.

Text_en: May he... may he be well.
Text_ortho: Make e, make im dey well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He should... should he be healthy.

Text_en: May he remain in good health.
Text_ortho: Make im bodi well.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He should be well - fed.

Text_en: Because they said he is... he is sick now.
Text_ortho: Because de say e dey, e dey sick now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because they said he was... he was sick.

Text_en: We don’t know his condition.
Text_ortho: We no know di condition.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We don’t know the condition.

Text_en: May God let him get well again so that everything will go well for Nigeria.
Text_ortho: Make God let am come back well so dat everyting go go on well for Nigeria.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: God should let him come back well so that everything will go well in Nigeria.

Text_en: So we thank God for everything.
Text_ortho: So we tank God for everyting sha.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, we thank God for everything.

Text_en: We thank God.
Text_ortho: We tank God.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We give praise to God.

Text_en: Because this nation we're in, if someone rules it today, we'll say he is the best.
Text_ortho: Because dis nation wey we dey inside, if some go rule am today, we go say na dat one better.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because this nation we are in, if some will rule it today, we will say that it's better.

Text_en: If another one comes in and we're happy he's come to power, we will be complaining.
Text_ortho: If anoder one enter wey we dey happy sey dat one don enter, we go dey complain.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If another one comes in and we are happy that this one has come in, we will complain.

Text_en: You will not bring up another sy-... uh... another... his own system which will make Nigeria... which, which will make everything harder for the people of Nigeria.
Text_ortho: You no go carry anoder sy-... ehn anoder, im own system come wey go make Nigeria, wey, wey make everyting go hard for people for Nigeria.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You will not carry another sy-... uh... another, his own system which will make Nigeria, which, which will make everything difficult for people in Nigeria.

Text_en: So may God just help us.
Text_ortho: So make God just help us.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, may God just help us.

Text_en: Because everything... we don’t know where we are going in Nigeria.
Text_ortho: Because everyting, we no know where we dey go for Nigeria.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because everything, we don’t know where we are going in Nigeria.

Text_en: We just don’t know.
Text_ortho: We no just know.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We just don't know.

Text_en: Look at the children now.
Text_ortho: See di children now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Look at the children.

Text_en: They go to school, we borrow money from cooperatives!
Text_ortho: Dem go school, we go collect money, cooperative o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They'll go to school, we'll collect money, copies.

Text_en: We struggle, send the children mo-... uh... to school, they come back from... they graduate from university, but no employment.
Text_ortho: We go struggle, send children mo-... ehn school, dem go come back from, dem go pass out for university, no work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: We will struggle, send children to mo-, uh... to schools, they will come back from... they will pass through university without a job.

Text_en: Nothing, nothing.
Text_ortho: Noting, noting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Nothing, nothing.

Text_en: What are we in for?
Text_ortho: Which one we dey?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Which one do we have?

Text_en: What do we, as Nigerians, want to do now?
Text_ortho: Which one we wan do for Nigeria now?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The one we want to do in Nigeria right now?

Text_en: No good jobs.
Text_ortho: No better work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: No good work.

Text_en: Uh... no drugs in our hospitals.
Text_ortho: Eh our hospitals, no drug.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Eh, our hospitals, there's no drug.

Text_en: If you go to the hospitals now, when you are sick, you go to the hospital, the most effective drug on the list, is the one that will be... is the one that will be the most expensive.
Text_ortho: If you go hospital now, wey you sick, you go hospital, di better medicine dere, na im go, na im go cost pass.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If you go to the hospital and you are sick and you go to the hospital, the best medicine there, it will... it will be expensive more.

Text_en: They will say, you should o-... no... go and buy it.
Text_ortho: Dem go say make you o, no go buy am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They will say you shouldn't buy it.

Text_en: Tomorrow, they'll say they're on strike.
Text_ortho: Tomorrow, dem fit say dem dey strike.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Tomorrow, they will say they're on the strike.

Text_en: Uh... doctors, they're not working.
Text_ortho: Eh doctors, de no work.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Eh, doctors, they don’t work.

Text_en: Sick people are in beds.
Text_ortho: Sick people dey bed.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Sick people are sleeping.

Text_en: No drugs, no treatment.
Text_ortho: No medicine, no treatment.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: No drugs, no treatment.

Text_en: Another death will happen again.
Text_ortho: Anoder death go join again.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Another death will come to you again.

Text_en: So may God just help us.
Text_ortho: So make only God just help us.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, only God should help us.

Text_en: Everything is fucked.
Text_ortho: Everyting don dabaru.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Everything has dabaru.

Text_en: Nigeria is fucked.
Text_ortho: E don dabaru for Nigeria.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He has dabaru in Nigeria.

Text_en: It's fucked.
Text_ortho: E don dabaru.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He has dabaru.

Text_en: I just pity the new born children that we're giving birth to now.
Text_ortho: I just dey pity for di new, new born children now wey we dey born.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'm just pity for the new born children we're already born.

Text_en: Because we don’t understand their future.
Text_ortho: Because deir tomorrow, we never understand.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because their tomorrow, we don’t understand.

Text_en: It's only God, he's the one who'll help us.
Text_ortho: Na only God na im go just help us.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's God who will just help us.

Text_en: It's serious.
Text_ortho: Na wa o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's true.

Text_en: Osas, your wedding you're preparing for, I... I'm looking forward to it.
Text_ortho: Osas, dis your wedding wey you dey prepare, me I dey look forward to di ting o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Osas, this wedding you're planning, I'm looking forward to it.

Text_en: Uh... auntie, it's not easy.
Text_ortho: Ehn auntie, di ting no easy o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehn auntie, the thing isn't easy.

Text_en: This is seriously keeping me up at night.
Text_ortho: Di ting dey give me serious sleepless night.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's giving me serious sleep for a whole night.

Text_en: Me, I'm not worried because I'm just looking forward to that day so I can dance.
Text_ortho: Me, I no worry o because my own be sey I just dey look forward to dat day so I go dance.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Me, I won't worry because my own is that I'm just looking forward to that day, so I will dance.

Text_en: I can't even sleep.
Text_ortho: I no dey fit sleep.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I can't sleep.

Text_en: And as it is, me, I like my bride, the girl's so fine.
Text_ortho: And as e be sey me I like my bride, the girl fine like anyting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And as it was that I liked my bride, the girl was as beautiful as anything.

Text_en: Hm.
Text_ortho: Hm.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hm.

Text_en: Her character, she and I just connected the first day I saw her.
Text_ortho: Her character, me, and her just blend di first day wey I see her.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: She's a good character, me and her... just blend the first day I saw her.

Text_en: That's how you just forgot your boy.
Text_ortho: Na so you just forget your boy be dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's how you just forget your boy.

Text_en: Ah, I forgot my boy.
Text_ortho: Ah, I forget my boy o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ah, I forgot my boy.

Text_en: You've gotten a new daughter.
Text_ortho: You don get new daughter.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You have a new daughter.

Text_en: You don't see?
Text_ortho: You no see?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You don't see?

Text_en: Uhuh!
Text_ortho: Ehen!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehen!

Text_en: You didn't see the attraction is that since I've gotten my daughter now, it's the daughter that fills... rules the house.
Text_ortho: You no see di attraction be sey as I don get my daughter now, na di daughter dey fill, rule house o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You don’t see the attraction is that as soon as I have my daughter, it's the daughter fills the whole house.

Text_en: There is no problem.
Text_ortho: No wahala now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: No problem now.

Text_en: Toh!
Text_ortho: Toh!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Alright!

Text_en: Because all of you, by the time you get married, you'll forget everything, but if I have a daughter I get along with, I can come to her house anytime.
Text_ortho: Because all of una now, by di time you marry, you forget everyting, but if I get daughter wey me, and her dey tilt, I come to her house anytime.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because all of you, by the time you marry, you forget everything, but if I have a daughter who is me and she's playing football, I will come to her house anytime.

Text_en: Auntie, I don't believe we'll forget home.
Text_ortho: Auntie, I no believe dat ting sey we go forget house o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Auntie, I don’t believe that we'll forget the house.

Text_en: Don't disturb me.
Text_ortho: No dey worry me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Don't worry me.

Text_en: Ah!
Text_ortho: Ah!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ah!

Text_en: That's how men behave.
Text_ortho: Na so men dey do o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: That's what men do.

Text_en: When you've concentrated your wife... on your wife, you'll have forgotten everything.
Text_ortho: When you don concentrate your wife, for your wife now, you don forget everyting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When you've focused on your wife, for your wife, you've forgotten everything.

Text_en: How?
Text_ortho: For where?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Where?

Text_en: No, no, no, no.
Text_ortho: No, no, no, no.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: No, no, no.

Text_en: I've had brothers that haven't forgotten our home.
Text_ortho: I don get broders wey never forget house now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I have got some brothers who have never forgotten their house.

Text_en: They're still there, they're still in the house.
Text_ortho: Dem still dey, dem still dey di house.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: They are still... they are still in the house.

Text_en: Uhuh, but the truth is that when you look at what they're doing and what their wives do, their wives, they are stronger.
Text_ortho: Ehen now, but di true be sey when you look wetin de dey do, wit wetin deir wives dey do, deir wives de dey stonger.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Uhuh, but the truth is that when you look at what they are doing, with what their wives are doing, their wives are stoning.

Text_en: Then, that's right.
Text_ortho: Den, dat one dey sha.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Then, that's right.

Text_en: And you agree that the house, it's the woman that takes care of it, right?
Text_ortho: And you gree sey house, na women dey take of am ba?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And do you agree that the house is for women, right?

Text_en: Haha, that's it.
Text_ortho: Haha dat one dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Haha, that's it.

Text_en: Yeah!
Text_ortho: Yeah!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Eh!

Text_en: It's the woman that takes care of it.
Text_ortho: Na woman dey take care of am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It was a woman who took care of her.

Text_en: You know... you'll just be there saying that it's you that's the head.
Text_ortho: Una know, una go just dey chill dere dey say na una be di head.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You know, you will just be chilling around, saying you are the head.

Text_en: That's right.
Text_ortho: Dat one dey.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: There's one.

Text_en: But auntie, that's not the issue.
Text_ortho: But auntie, no be dat, na im be di ting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: But auntie, it's not that, that's the thing.

Text_en: The major issue is the wedding preparation.
Text_ortho: Di major ting na di wedding preparation.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The main thing is the wedding preparation.

Text_en: Ah!
Text_ortho: Ah!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ah!

Text_en: What preparation?
Text_ortho: Wetin preparation?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: How are we doing it?

Text_en: It's you... is it not you who wants to bring a wife to the house?
Text_ortho: Na you, no be you wan bring wife come house?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You, you don't want to bring a wife to your house?

Text_en: Uh... sure I want to bring a wife to the house but, auntie, the thing uh... is feeding off my money.
Text_ortho: Ehn I wan to carry wife come house now, but kai mehn auntie, dat ting ehn, dey sap my money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Uh... I want to carry a wife to my house, but a auntie, that thing uh... sap my money.

Text_en: Ehe, so, it's you that will...
Text_ortho: Ehe so na you go...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehe, so, it's you who...

Text_en: It's good.
Text_ortho: E good now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's good.

Text_en: Because when you know that something is precious, no matter the amount, it will not disturb you.
Text_ortho: Because when you know sey someting dey precious, no matter di amount, e no go worry you.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Because when you know that something is precious, no matter how much it is, it won't bother you.

Text_en: As it is now, with the reccession, we don't even have the money, that's the problem.
Text_ortho: As e be now sef, recession, we no even get di money, na im be di ting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Even now, as it is now, a recession, we don’t even have the money, that's the thing.

Text_en: Aha, you don't have to use a lot of money.
Text_ortho: A'Ah you don't need to use plenty money now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: A'Ah, you don't need to spend a lot of money.

Text_en: Aha!
Text_ortho: Aha!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Aha!

Text_en: Auntie, how can you tell me that I don't need to?
Text_ortho: Auntie, how you go tell me sey I no need to?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Auntie, how will you tell me that I don't need it?

Text_en: You wanna come and eat?
Text_ortho: You want come chop?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You wanna eat?

Text_en: I'll come and eat.
Text_ortho: I go come chop now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'll come and eat.

Text_en: Even if I don't eat, there is no problem.
Text_ortho: Even I no chop, no problem.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I didn't even eat, I didn't have any problem.

Text_en: People want to come and eat.
Text_ortho: People want come chop.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: People want to eat.

Text_en: Uhuh!
Text_ortho: Ehen!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehen!

Text_en: What will you do?
Text_ortho: Wetin you go do?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: What will you do?

Text_en: Won't I provide food for them?
Text_ortho: I no go provide food for dem?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I won't provide food for them?

Text_en: What's there?
Text_ortho: Wetin dey?
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: What is it?

Text_en: Corn isn't easy.
Text_ortho: Maize no dey easy.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Maize isn't easy.

Text_en: Hm.
Text_ortho: Hm.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Hm.

Text_en: Just cook tuwo.
Text_ortho: Just cook tuwo.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Just cook tuwo.

Text_en: Haha, tuwo will be plenty.
Text_ortho: Haha tuwo go plenty pass.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Haha, the tuwo will be increased.

Text_en: Auntie, you go to market.
Text_ortho: Auntie, you dey enter market.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Auntie, you are going to the market.

Text_en: You know how much corn is in the market now.
Text_ortho: You know how much be maize now for market.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You know how much corn is now in the market.

Text_en: I know!
Text_ortho: I know now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I know.

Text_en: Uhuh!
Text_ortho: Ehen!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehen!

Text_en: And the thing is that, wu-... No matter how much you spend on the wedding, the truth is that people will still insist that they didn't get food to eat.
Text_ortho: And di ting be sey wu-... no matter how you spend for wedding, di truth be sey people go still insist sey de no get food chop.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And the thing is that wu-... no matter how much you spend at a wedding, the truth is that people will insist that they don't have food to eat.

Text_en: Uh... but there are major things that I need to do.
Text_ortho: Ehn but e get major tings wey I need to do.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Ehn... but there are some serious things I need to do.

Text_en: Then that's to say you're supposed to plan ahead.
Text_ortho: Naim be sey you suppose plan ahead.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: So, you're supposed to plan ahead.

Text_en: Auntie, even buying her wedding gown is money, getting my own suit is money.
Text_ortho: Auntie, to even get her wedding gown sef, na money, to get my own suit, na money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Auntie, to even get her wedding gown is a money... to get my own suit is a money.

Text_en: It's true, it's true.
Text_ortho: Na true now, na true now.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: It's true now, it's true now.

Text_en: There's food.

Text_en: I'll loosen it, and the, the plug ignites the car's engine.

EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will loose it, and the... the light is the one that gave the vehicle to fire.

Text_en: It powers up the car when the fuel circulates under the top cylinder.

EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He used to set a fire on the fuel under the cylinders.

Text_en: The piston starts taking the fuel up while the plug powers it up.

EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: The engines were starting to put the fuel in order, while the lights were starting to put fire.

Text_en: At the same time, there's a certain fire in the middle of the engine which we call the breaking fire.

EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: At that time, there was a particular fire we called a break in the middle of the engine.

Text_ortho: Or fuel.

Text_en: From there, we will figure out how to handle the issue.
Text_ortho: From dere, we go know how to treat di problem.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: From there, we will know how to deal with the problem.

Text_en: When you call me to say your car is overheating when you're moving, you noticed that your car got hot, I only know that maybe your fan is not working, maybe the gasket of your car's top cylinder's has burnt, maybe the temperature switch is not set.
Text_ortho: When you call me sey your car is overheating when you are moving, you see your car temperature rise, I only know dat maybe your fan is not working, maybe your top cylinder gasket don burn, maybe di temperature switch not set.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: When you call me saying that your car is overheating when you are moving, you see your car's temperature going up, I only know that maybe your fan is not working, maybe your top gasket has burned, maybe the heat is not set.

Text_en: Something like that.
Text_ortho: Someting like dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Something like that.

Text_en: Or when you call me to say your car is acting up, it doesn't idle smoothly... if it uses a carburetor, I'll say I'll loosen the carburetor and service it.
Text_ortho: Or when you call me sey your motor misbehaving, e no hold slow, if it is di one dat use carburetor, I will say, I will loose di carburetor and service.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Or if you call me saying that your vehicle is failing and it doesn't work well, if it's the carburetor, I will say, "I will loose the carburetor and my service."

Text_en: Or if it is an injector, I will loosen the injector, buy.
Text_ortho: Or if it is injector, I will loose di injector, buy.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Or if it's an injector, I will loose the injector, buy it.

Text_en: There's something we call carburetor cleaner.
Text_ortho: E get one ting wey we dey call carburetor cleaner.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: There's something we call carburetor cleaner.

Text_en: I will buy it, and come and...
Text_ortho: I will bought it, and come and...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I will buy it, and come and...

Text_en: That stuff, it cleans out the dirt which is in the dust inside.
Text_ortho: Dat one, e use to clean di dirty wey dey inside, di dust wey is inside.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He used it to clean up the dust on the inside, the dust on the inside.

Text_en: It cleans it, and all that.
Text_ortho: Use to clean it, and di rest.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Use them to clean it up and the rest.

Text_en: And when you say you just came...
Text_ortho: And when you say you just come...
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: And when you said you just came...

Text_en: Imagine you just came here and said, "hey, here's my car!"
Text_ortho: Imagine you just come say eh see my motor o!
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Imagine you just come and say uh... Look at my car!

Text_en: It's just acting up.
Text_ortho: E just misbehaving.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He just misbehaved.

Text_en: I was... I was driving and it's just acting up.
Text_ortho: Am, am going, e just misbehaving.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He was... he was going... he was just misbehaving.

Text_en: You don't know what's wrong.
Text_ortho: You don't know what is wrong.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You don't know what's wrong.

Text_en: Just heard the sound puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh.
Text_ortho: Just hear puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Just hear puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh, puh.

Text_en: If I go there, if you load your gear, maybe, it's that the engine seat (mount) is worn out, or the engine is not... is not set right, or the idling, or something like that.
Text_ortho: If I go dere, if you load your gear, maybe, is di engine seat don cut, or di engine no, no dey set, or dey slow, or someting like dat.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: If I go there, if you load your gear, maybe, it's the engine's seat has cut, or the engine doesn't... it's not getting tuned, or it's slow, or something like that.

Text_en: There are a lot of things about the mechanics' job that if you come and tell me that your car has a problem...
Text_ortho: Dere is many tings about mechanics wey, if you come and ask me say your car get problem.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: There are many things about mechanics which... if you come and ask me if your car gets problems.

Text_en: You see, when I wanted to start this thing, well, a friend talked me into it.
Text_ortho: You see by di time wey I wan start dis ting, toh na my friend talk to me o.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: You know, by the time I wanted to start this thing, well, it was my friend talking to me.

Text_en: He said I should buy this thing.
Text_ortho: E say mey I buy dis ting.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He said I should buy this thing.

Text_en: This thing is good.
Text_ortho: Dis ting dey good.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: This thing is good.

Text_en: Well, at the time he asked me to buy it, I didn't have any money.
Text_ortho: Toh di time wey e con tell me sey mey I buy am, I no get money.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: Well, the time he told me I should buy it, I didn't have money.

Text_en: Then he caught one and he said he should give it to me.
Text_ortho: E con catch one, e say mey e give me.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: He caught one, he said he should give it to me.

Text_en: I said... he said w-... I should go and put it in my house.
Text_ortho: I say, e say mey w-... mey I go put am for my house.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I said... he said I should w-... go and put it in my house.

Text_en: I did what he said.
Text_ortho: I go put am.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I'll put it in.

Text_en: God provided money and I bought a male.
Text_ortho: God don con give me money, I go buy man.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: God has given me money, I went to buy a man.

Text_en: Then I put it in.
Text_ortho: I con put.
EnglishTranslationPCMWithoutDEVTest: I put in.

Text_en: They started giving me eggs.
Text_ortho: Don con dey do egg for me.
